collectibles.title: The Sad Onion
effects: +0.7 Tears Up

collectibles.title: The Inner Eye
effects: Tears now shoot three at a time (Triple Shot)
Tears Down significantly (tears = tears * 2.1 + 3).

collectibles.title: Spoon Bender
effects: Gives Isaac's tears a homing effect.

collectibles.title: Cricket's Head
effects: +0.5 Damage Up
x1.5 times Damage Multiplier (Does not stack with the Magic Mushroom multiplier).
Can be found in golden chests.
Cricket's Head used to be known as Max's Head in the original game and was renamed for Rebirth.

collectibles.title: My Reflection
effects: Gives tears a boomerang effect.
+1.5 Range Up.
+0.6 Shot Speed Up.
+1 Tear Height.

collectibles.title: Number One
effects: Gives you a very high tear rate in exchange for a big range down.
+1.5 Tears Up.
-17.62 Range Down.
+0.76 Tear Height.

collectibles.title: Blood of the Martyr
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
x1.5 times Damage Multiplier if you also have Book of Belial (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom or Cricket's Head multipliers)

collectibles.title: Brother Bobby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots normal tears which do 3.5 damage.
Brother Bobby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Skatole
effects: A lot of fly enemies are no longer aggressive towards Isaac.
Attack Fly, Dart Fly, Eternal Fly, and Ring Fly are transformed into a neutral black fly.
Boom Fly, Red Boom Fly, Drowned Boom Fly move slower, but still deal contact damage.
Moter, Level 2 Fly, Full Fly, Pooter, and Super Pooter move slower and deal no contact damage.
Can only be obtained from the shell game in the arcade.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Halo of Flies
effects: Gives Isaac 2 orbital flies which block enemy shots.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: 1UP
effects: Gives the player an extra life
When revived, the green mushroom that follows Isaac will disappear and he will respawn with the same amount of red heart containers at full health.
Resurrection takes place before all other items which give you an extra life

collectibles.title: Magic Mushroom
effects: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
x1.5 times Damage Multiplier (Does not stack with the multipliers from Cricket's Head / Blood of The Martyr + Book of Belial).
+5.25 Range Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.
Increases the size of your player sprite, but doesn't increase the hitbox.
Fully restores all red heart containers.
Counts as 1 of 3 mushroom items needed towards the Fun Guy transformation.
Counts as 1 of 3 size-increasing items needed towards the Stompy transformation.

collectibles.title: The Virus
effects: Deals poison damage on contact with enemies (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick).
Has a chance to drop from the Lust miniboss fight.
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation.
Has a 20% chance to cause enemies to drop black hearts if it was poisoned..
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Demon Beggar, Lust Miniboss

collectibles.title: Roid Rage
effects: +0.6 Speed Up.
+5.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Shot Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar

effects: +1 Health Up
Fully restores all red heart containers
Has a chance to drop from the Gluttony miniboss fight.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, Gluttony Miniboss

collectibles.title: Raw Liver
effects: +2 Health Up.
Full red heart heal.

collectibles.title: Skeleton Key
effects: Gives Isaac 99 Keys

collectibles.title: A Dollar
effects: Gives Isaac 99 coins.
Can drop from an exploding slot machine while playing it.

collectibles.title: Boom!
effects: +10 Bombs

collectibles.title: Transcendence
effects: Gives Isaac the ability to fly.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 3 times.

collectibles.title: The Compass
effects: Shows most icons on the map (Shops, Item Rooms, Boss Rooms etc.)
Does not show the layout of the map.
Doesn't show the location of Secret or Super Secret rooms.
Room icons will not show if a Curse of the Lost is in effect on the current floor.

collectibles.title: Lunch
effects: +1 Health Up.

collectibles.title: Dinner
effects: +1 Health Up.

collectibles.title: Dessert
effects: +1 Health Up.

collectibles.title: Breakfast
effects: +1 Health Up.

collectibles.title: Rotten Meat
effects: +1 Health Up

collectibles.title: Wooden Spoon
effects: +0.3 Speed Up.

collectibles.title: The Belt
effects: +0.3 Speed Up.

collectibles.title: Mom's Underwear
effects: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Mom's Heels
effects: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Mom's Lipstick
effects: +5.25 Range Up
+0.5 Tear Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Wire Coat Hanger
effects: +0.7 Tears Up.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 4 times.

collectibles.title: The Bible
effects: Gives Isaac angel wings for the current room, allowing him to fly.
Instantly kills the Mom's Foot, Mom's Heart and It Lives boss fights.
If used during the Satan fight, The Bible will instantly kill Isaac.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
tags:
angel room item,
        shop room pool

collectibles.title: The Book of Belial
effects: Upon use, gives +2 damage up which lasts for the current room.
x1.5 times Damage Multiplier if you also have Blood of the Martyr (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom or Cricket's Head multipliers).
Increases your chances of getting a devil/angel room by +12.5%
Judas starts with this item.
The effect stacks if used multiple times.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.

collectibles.title: The Necronomicon
effects: Deals 40 damage to everything in the room when used.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by using 4 XIII - Death cards.

collectibles.title: The Poop
effects: Drops a poop on the floor.
Blue Baby starts with this item.
Can be placed next to a pit and exploded to make a bridge.
Can be placed over a broken red poop to overwrite it, causing it to no longer regenerate.
Counts as 1 of 3 poop items needed towards the Oh Crap transformation.

collectibles.title: Mr. Boom
effects: Drops a large bomb below the player which does 110 damage.
Compatible with bomb modifiers, such as Glitter Bombs, Sticky Bombs etc.
Has a chance to drop from the Wrath miniboss fight.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Wrath Miniboss, Bomb Beggar

collectibles.title: Tammy's Head
effects: Fires 10 tears in a circle around Isaac.
Each tear is equal to your damage stat + 25 flat damage.
The tears spawned from Tammy's Head retain tear effects of Isaac's tears, such as poison or homing.
Synergizes extremely well with Brimstone due to how the damage from both items is calculated when combined.

collectibles.title: Mom's Bra
effects: When used, freezes all enemies in the current room for about 4 seconds.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Kamikaze
effects: Causes an explosion near Isaac which takes away half a heart and does 40 damage all enemies in close proximity.

collectibles.title: Mom's Pad
effects: When used, causes all enemies in the current room to run away from Isaac in fear for 5 seconds.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Bob's Rotten Head
effects: A poison bomb which can be thrown and leaves a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius. It also leaves a gas cloud at the place where it exploded.
The bomb deals 185 damage + your tear damage on hit and leaves a damage over time poison effect that does 3 times your tear damage per tick.
Synergizes with tear modifying items such as My Reflection or Tiny Planet.
Has a chance to drop from the Sloth miniboss fight.
Counts as 1 of 3 poison items needed towards the Bob transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Gold Chest, Sloth Miniboss

collectibles.title: Teleport
effects: Teleports Isaac to a random location on the map.
Can't be used to teleport to the I AM ERROR room.

collectibles.title: Yum Heart
effects: Heals Isaac for one whole red heart.
Maggy starts with this item.
When used as the Keeper, one coin HP is restored.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Lust miniboss fight.

collectibles.title: Lucky Foot
effects: +1.0 Luck Up.
Better chance to win while gambling at the Shell Game and Fortune Telling Machine.
Higher chance to get a random drop after clearing a room.

collectibles.title: Doctor's Remote
effects: A target is placed on the floor which can be controlled. After a few seconds a huge missile hits the target and deals 20x your tear damage to anything nearby.
Essentially a one-time use of the Epic Fetus item.

collectibles.title: Cupid's Arrow
effects: Isaac's tears now have a piercing effect which allows them to travel through enemies instead of breaking on hit.

collectibles.title: Shoop Da Whoop!
effects: When used, fires a high damage laser in a straight line across the room in a similar way to Brimstone.
The laser deals damage equal to double your tear damage. The laser hits up to 13 times if an enemy stays inside it for the duration.
Has a chance to drop from the Envy and Super Envy miniboss fights.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Envy Miniboss, Super Envy Miniboss

collectibles.title: Steven
effects: +1 Damage Up.
Can be found in gold chests, or dropped by the Steven boss.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Basement 40 times and defeating the Steven boss.

collectibles.title: Pentagram
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
+10% chance of a devil/angel room opening while held.
A second Pentagram will give an extra +5% chance.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Boss Room, Curse Room, Devil Room

collectibles.title: Dr. Fetus
effects: Instead of tears, Isaac now shoots bombs from his eyes, which explode dealing damage to anything nearby.
Bomb damage = damage * 5 + 30.
Tears Down (Tear delay * 2.5).
Bombs will also synergize with other bomb items and tear modifiers, including Sad Bombs, Mr. Mega and many more.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 9 times.

collectibles.title: Magneto
effects: Causes pickups on the floor move towards the player.
Works across pits, but not through Key blocks.

collectibles.title: Treasure Map
effects: Reveals the entire map for every floor except the secret room locations.
Does not show the icons for any unexplored rooms.
Can still help you to guess which direction the boss room is in, due to the fact that the Boss Room is usually in the room furthest away from the first room.
tags:
shop room pool,
        shop item pool

collectibles.title: Mom's Eye
collectibles.pickup: Eye in the back of your head
effects: Isaac has a random chance to fire another tear out the back of his head.
The chance to fire the second tear can improve based on your luck stat and will always activate at +2 Luck.
Synergizes very well with a lot of items. If used with Brimstone you have a 100% chance to fire a laser out the back of your head.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Lemon Mishap
effects: When used, drops a pool of 'lemonade' on the floor which damages any enemies that come into contact with it for 8 damage per tick.

collectibles.title: Distant Admiration
effects: Gives Isaac an orbiting fly which deals 5 contact damage to enemies per tick.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Book of Shadows
effects: Gives the player an invulnerability effect which lasts for a 10 seconds.
Can be used to get free hits on the Blood Donation machines and Devil Beggars.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.

collectibles.title: The Ladder
effects: Allows Isaac to walk over gaps with a width of one tile.

collectibles.title: Charm of the Vampire
effects: Heals half a heart after every 13 enemies killed.
Works with the Keeper for restoring coin HP.

collectibles.title: The Battery
effects: All spacebar items can now be 'overcharged', allowing them to be charged up twice instead of once.
The extra charges appear in yellow on top of the normal green bars.
If playing with Afterbirth+, this item works with self-recharging items.

collectibles.title: Steam Sale
effects: Items in the shop are now -50% off.
15c items are reduced to 7c. 5c pickups become 3c. 3c pickups become 2c.
Has a chance to drop from the Greed miniboss fight or when bombing the shopkeeper.
In Afterbirth, taking multiple Steam Sales will reduce all shop prices to 0 coins. This was nerfed in Afterbirth+, where it simply gives a chance to discount items with each new Steam Sale.
This item is called Steamy Sale on PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One and Switch versions, probably due to copyright reasons.

collectibles.title: Anarchist Cookbook
effects: Spawns 6 troll bombs at random locations around the room.
Bombs are effected by other passive bomb items.
Has a chance to drop from the Pride miniboss fight.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.

collectibles.title: The Hourglass
effects: When used, slows down all enemies in the current room and their projectiles for about 8 seconds.

collectibles.title: Sister Maggy
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac around and shoots blood tears that deal 3.5 damage.
The tears appear red but have no additional damage.
Sister Maggy fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Technology
effects: Isaac's tears are replaced with a laser that has unlimited range and can only fire at right angles.
Lasers travel through enemies but not obstacles in the room.
Synergizes with most items that affect how many tears you fire (20/20, Mutant Spider etc.) or the path they take (My Reflection, Tiny Planet etc.).

collectibles.title: Chocolate Milk
effects: Isaac can now charge shots for more damage by holding down the fire button.
At full charge, your tears do 4 times more damage.
Tears fired at the minimum possible charge do roughly 1/3 of your normal damage.
You can spam the fire button to rapid fire, however the overall damage per second will be low.
Tears down: Delay * 2.5.

collectibles.title: Growth Hormones
effects: +1.0 Damage Up
+0.4 Speed Up
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation.

collectibles.title: Mini Mush
effects: +0.3 Speed Up
Decreases range stat by -4.25 but increases your tear height by 1.5, increasing your actual tear range.
Causes Isaac to shrink in size (including hitbox slightly).
Can be dropped when exploding mushrooms in the environment that are usually found in the Caves/Catacombs and in secret rooms.
Counts as 1 of 3 mushroom items needed towards the Fun Guy transformation.

collectibles.title: Rosary
effects: +3 Soul Hearts.
Adds several instances of The Bible item into all item pools.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Cube of Meat
effects: An orbital which blocks shots and damages enemies it comes into contact with for 7 damage per tick.
Exclusively drops from one of the horsemen bosses.
2 cubes of meat transform the orbital into a meat head which fires blood tears which deal 3.5 damage each.
3 cubes of meat transform it into a meat boy familiar that walks around and deals 3.5 contact damage per tick to enemies.
4 cubes of meat cause the meat boy familiar to grow in size and do 5.5 damage per tick instead.
Any further cubes of meat past 4 will start the cycle again.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom for the first time.

collectibles.title: A Quarter
effects: +25 Coins
Has a very small chance to drop after destroying one of the pots that appear in the Basement and Cellar floors.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Greed miniboss fight.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Devil Room, Secret Room, Super Greed Miniboss
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 8 times.

collectibles.title: PhD
effects: Converts most negative pills into their positive counterparts, e.g. Stat Down becomes Stat Up. Bad Trip becomes Balls of Steel. Amnesia becomes I Can See Forever etc.
Pills are identified before using them.
Drops one pill on pickup.
Heals for 2 full red hearts.
Adds 0-2 coins to the payout when you use a Blood Donation machine or IV Bag.

collectibles.title: X-Ray Vision
effects: Reveals the entrance to secret rooms and automatically opens the hole, removing the need for bombs to enter.

collectibles.title: My Little Unicorn
effects: Gives Isaac invincibility and +0.28 Speed for 6 seconds.
While active you cannot fire tears, but running into enemies will deal 40 contact damage per second.
Allows free hits on the Blood Donation machines and devil beggars.

collectibles.title: Book of Revelations
effects: Upon use, gives Isaac an extra Soul heart.
Using this item gives you a higher chance of finding a horsemen boss at the end of the floor.
+17.5% chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating one of the horsemen bosses for the first time.

collectibles.title: The Mark
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
+1 Soul Heart.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.

collectibles.title: The Pact
effects: +0.5 Damage Up.
+0.7 Tears Up.
+2 Soul Hearts.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.

collectibles.title: Dead Cat
effects: Isaac's health is set to 1 and he also gains 9 extra lives.
Each time Isaac dies, he will respawn with 1 Health.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Pride mini boss.
The floating Dead Cat head that follows you will disappear when you are on your last life (Very useful for The Lost)
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Super Pride Miniboss

collectibles.title: Lord of the Pit
effects: Gives Isaac demon wings and the ability to fly.
+0.3 Speed Up

collectibles.title: The Nail
effects: +0.7 Damage Up.
-0.18 Speed Down.
+1 Soul Heart
Gives you the ability to crush most obstacles by walking over them.
Allows Isaac to deal contact damage to enemies for the current room. Does not prevent Isaac from taking contact damage.
All the above effects are only active when the item is used for the current room.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Azazel.

collectibles.title: We Need To Go Deeper
effects: Spawns a trapdoor at Isaac's feet which allows him to travel to the next floor.
The trapdoor has a 10% chance to become a Crawl Space or Black Market.
Has no effect in Sheol, Cathedral, Chest and Dark Room.
Cannot spawn a trapdoor directly infront of a secret room entrance.
Can destroy rocks if used when Isaac is flying over a rock.

collectibles.title: Deck of Cards
effects: Gives Isaac a random tarot card on use.

collectibles.title: Monstro's Tooth
effects: When used, spawns a Monstro which will jump on a random enemy in the room, dealing 120 damage and destroying nearby obstacles.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Basement II for the first time.

collectibles.title: Loki's Horns
effects: Everytime you fire a tear, there is a chance that you will also fire three more tears in all cardinal directions.
The chance to fire 4-way tears is affected by your luck stat and at +7 Luck it will activate every time.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Lokii for the first time.

collectibles.title: Little Chubby
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and charges forwards, dealing 3.5 damage per tick to any enemies it comes into contact with.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Caves II for the first time.

collectibles.title: Spider Bite
effects: Tears now have a chance of slowing enemies and their projectiles for 2.5 seconds.
The chance to slow enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate every time.

collectibles.title: The Small Rock
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up.
-0.2 Speed Down.
Has a chance to drop when exploding a tinted rock.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 tinted rocks.

collectibles.title: Spelunker Hat
effects: Reveals adjacent room types, this includes revealing if you're next to a Secret Room or Super Secret Rooms.
Gives Isaac a slight glow when Curse of Darkness is active.

collectibles.title: Super Bandage
effects: +1 Health Up.
+2 Soul Hearts
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, pink, plaster, sticker
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by making a Super Bandage Girl.

collectibles.title: The Gamekid
effects: When used Isaac transforms into pacman, which makes him invincible for 6 seconds and does 40 contact damage to enemies per chomp.
Everytime you 'eat' 2 enemies, you regain 1/2 heart of red health.
You can't shoot tears while the effect is active.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by visiting 10 arcades.

collectibles.title: Sack of Pennies
effects: A bag that floats around following Isaac and drops a random coin every 2 rooms.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Isaac with Cain.

collectibles.title: Robo-Baby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots lasers, similar to the Technology item.
Robo-Baby's laser is spectral and piercing (It will pass through rocks and objects in the environment)
Robo-Baby's lasers deal 3.5 damage per hit.

collectibles.title: Little C.H.A.D.
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and drops half a red heart every 3 rooms.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Caves 30 times and defeating C.H.A.D.

collectibles.title: The Book of Sin
effects: Spawns a random pickup on the floor.
Any pickups are possible from this item, including Bombs, hearts, keys, coins, pills, batteries, tarot cards, runes etc.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating each of the Seven Sins once.

collectibles.title: The Relic
effects: A blue cross that follows Isaac and drops a soul heart every 5 or 6 rooms.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Maggy.

collectibles.title: Little Gish
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and fires black tar tears, which slow enemy movement and projectile speed for a few seconds.
Little Gish's tears do 3.5 damage.
Little Gish fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
A Guaranteed drop from the Gish boss fight.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Depths 20 times and killing the Gish boss.

collectibles.title: Little Steven
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and fires homing tears that deal 3.5 damage each.
Has a high chance to drop from the Steven boss fight.
Little Steven fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second with a slightly longer range than other familiars.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by killing the Steven boss for the first time.

collectibles.title: The Halo
effects: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, Angel Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by killing Mom (Mom's Foot or Mom's Heart) using The Bible.

collectibles.title: Mom's Bottle of Pills
effects: When used, gives Isaac a random pill.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Shop, Challenge Room, Beggar, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: The Common Cold
effects: Tears now have a random chance to apply a poison effect, causing double your tear damage per tick to enemies over time.
The chance to fire poison shots is affected by your luck stat and at +12 Luck it will activate every time.

collectibles.title: The Parasite
effects: Isaac's tears now split into two upon contact with enemies or the environment.
Tears that split off from the main tear do less damage (tear damage * 0.5).
Tears can keep splitting if they still have range and damage above 1.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by collecting two of the following items: Bob's Rotten Head, Dead Cat, Cricket's Head, Tammy's Head.

collectibles.title: The D6
effects: When used, replaces all pedestal items in the current room with another random item. Re-rolled items pick from the current room's item pool.
Isaac starts with this item after it is unlocked.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating the Isaac boss with Blue Baby.

collectibles.title: Mr. Mega
effects: +5 Bombs
Bombs now do 110 damage (up from 60) and have a larger blast radius.
Can be found in the secret room.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Wrath miniboss fight.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Secret Room, Super Wrath Miniboss
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 10 tinted rocks.

collectibles.title: Pinking Shears
effects: Cuts Isaac's head from his body for the current room, allowing him to fly and leaving the decapitated body to run around attacking enemies for 5.5 damage per tick.

collectibles.title: The Wafer
effects: All damage taken is reduced to half a heart.
Damaged reduction is reduced from every source in the game except Devil Deals and health down pills.
Does not prevent death (i.e. Suicide King or using The Bible on Isaac, ??? or Satan).
The Wafer becomes most effective in the Womb and beyond where enemies all deal a whole heart of damage.
The Wafer causes the Sharp Plug item to only cost 1/2 a heart per use.
Has no effect with the Keeper - there's no such thing as half a coin health point.

collectibles.title: Money = Power
effects: +0.04 Damage Up for every coin you currently have.
At 99 coins this item gives +3.96 Damage Up.

+0.04 per coin is the amount added before the damage formula is calculated, as this is the only way to show a consistent amount of damage given. You may see more or less than this on the Found HUD overlay, however this number varies based on your other damage increasing items

collectibles.title: Mom's Contacts
effects: Tears now have a random chance to freeze enemies in place.
The chance to freeze enemies is affected by your luck stat.
+0.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.
Chance to activate increases with luck, up to around 50% chance at +20 luck.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by collecting 3 'Mom' items in one playthrough.

collectibles.title: The Bean
effects: Upon use, this item causes Isaac to fart and poison any enemies in close proximity.
The Bean deals 5 damage, then poisons enemies for 6 total ticks of damage.
The poison deals your current tear damage per tick.

collectibles.title: Guardian Angel
effects: An orbital which does 7 contact damage per tick, blocks shots and increases the speed of all other orbitals.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Maggy.

collectibles.title: Demon Baby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and automatically fires tears that deal 3 damage each at any enemies in close range.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Azazel.

collectibles.title: Mom's Knife
effects: Tears are replaced with a knife which can be charged and thrown in a boomerang style action.
The knife can also do damage without being thrown as a close range melee weapon.
When used as a melee weapon, Mom's Knife deals your tear damage * 2 per tick.
At the furthest point from Isaac the knife deals your tear damage * 6.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Devil Room, Challenge Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Isaac.

collectibles.title: Ouija Board
effects: Gives Isaac spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks).

collectibles.title: 9 Volt
effects: Automatically gives you 1 bar of charge after using your spacebar item.
Fully recharges your current spacebar item when picked up.
Causes the Sharp Plug item to become useless for 2+ room recharge items, due to the fact that you can never have 0 charge on your spacebar item.
Any items which are normally a 1 room recharge are now timed instead.

collectibles.title: Dead Bird
effects: When Isaac takes damage, the dead bird will spawn and attack nearby enemies in the current room for 2 damage per tick.
Eve starts with this item.

collectibles.title: Brimstone
effects: Tears are replaced with the ability to charge and fire a powerful laser that travels in a straight line across the room, dealing a lot of damage (damage * 13) to any enemies it comes into contact with.
Does not directly affect your Damage stat but hits enemies 13 times per charge, spawning Guppy flies with every hit.
Synergizes very well with a lot of items including Tammy's Head, Tiny Planet, Inner Eye (Triple Shot), Mutant Spider (Quad Shot) and many others.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.

collectibles.title: Blood Bag
effects: +1 Health Up
+0.3 Speed Up
Heals for 5 full red hearts.
Has a chance to drop while playing any Blood Donation machine.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by playing the Blood Donation machine 30 times.

collectibles.title: Odd Mushroom (Thin)
effects: Gives you a high rate of fire in exchange for a damage down.
+1.7 Tears Up.
+0.3 Speed Up.
Damage Down (damage * 0.9 - 0.4).
Counts as 1 of 3 mushroom items needed towards the Fun Guy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Secret Room, brown, purple, grey, gray

collectibles.title: Odd Mushroom (Large)
effects: +1 Health Up (The given heart container is empty)
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
-0.1 Speed Down.
+0.5 Tear Height.
Counts as 1 of 3 mushroom items needed towards the Fun Guy transformation.

collectibles.title: Whore of Babylon
effects: When you only have half a red heart remaining or less, you enter a curse state which adds +1.5 damage and +0.3 speed.
When playing as Eve, this item activates with one FULL heart remaining or less AND also removes her 0.75 damage multiplier, raising it up to 1.0.
The effect is permanently active for characters with no red hearts (e.g. Blue Baby, The Lost).
One of Eve's starting items.

collectibles.title: Monster Manual
effects: When used, gives a random familiar for the rest of the room.
It can spawn familiars you haven't unlocked yet!

collectibles.title: Dead Sea Scrolls
effects: Upon use, the dead sea scrolls gives a random spacebar item effect.
An item that can be found in the Angel room.

collectibles.title: Bobby - Bomb
effects: +5 Bombs.
All of Isaac's bombs now having a homing effect when placed on the floor.

collectibles.title: Razor Blade
effects: When used, deals damage to Isaac in exchange for +1.2 damage up which lasts for the current room.
In Afterbirth Eve starts with this item after donating 439 coins to the Greed Donation Machine..
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Eve.

collectibles.title: Forget Me Now
effects: Upon use, this item refreshes the current floor with brand new rooms, monsters and items, as if you had entered a new floor.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Blue Baby.

collectibles.title: Forever Alone
effects: An orbiting fly which deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Bucket of Lard
effects: +2 Health Up.
-0.2 Speed Down.
Of the two heart containers given from this item, only 1/2 a red heart of them is filled.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Gluttony miniboss fight.

collectibles.title: A Pony
effects: Allows Isaac to fly while the Pony is held.
Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high.
When the active attack is used, Isaac will dash across the screen dealing 40 contact damage to anything he hits.
Drops from the Headless Horseman boss fight.

collectibles.title: Bomb Bag
effects: A bag of bombs that will drop a bomb pickup every 2 rooms.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Secret Room, Bomb Beggar
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Cain.

collectibles.title: A Lump of Coal
effects: Tears gain a damage up and increase in size based on the distance they travel.
The length of a normal room roughly gives +6 damage, but this can be higher with double rooms or Tiny Planet.
In Afterbirth this item synergises with Brimstone and Tech, allowing them to do more damage the further away the enemy is. If not playing with Afterbirth it simply gives Brimstone +2 flat damage.

collectibles.title: Guppy's Paw
effects: When used, removes one heart container and gives you 3 soul hearts.
Bone hearts cannot be converted.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest
tags:
devil deal,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Guppy's Tail
effects: Gives a 1/3 chance for room clear rewards to become a normal or locked chest, and a 1/3 chance to reward nothing at all.
Doesn't affect coins dropped after waves in Greed Mode.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest

collectibles.title: IV Bag
effects: Upon use, the IV Bag takes half a red heart and spawns 1-3 coins (the same effect as a blood donation machine)
Can drop from a blood donation machine after playing it.
In the Womb and beyond this deals 1 full heart of damage.
If no red hearts exist, other types of hearts are consumed instead.
With the Keeper this is changed to spawning 0-1 coins per use instead.

collectibles.title: Best Friend
effects: Places a decoy on the floor which attracts enemies and explodes after a period of time.
When it explodes, it deals 110 damage to everything in radius (Same damage as Mr Mega bombs).

collectibles.title: Remote Detonator
effects: +5 Bombs.
Bombs no longer automatically explode and will only do so when you activate the remote detonator.
Can be used to detonate Dr. Fetus bombs early.

collectibles.title: Stigmata
effects: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.

collectibles.title: Mom's Purse
effects: Isaac can now hold two trinkets at the same time
Allows you to pick up more trinkets while also holding The Tick
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Bob's Curse
effects: All of Isaac's bombs now leave a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
+5 Bombs.
As well as dealing the standard 60 damage for a bomb, it will apply a Damage over Time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
Has a chance to drop from the Super Sloth miniboss fight.
Counts as 1 of 3 poison items needed towards the Bob transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Super Sloth Miniboss, Bomb Beggar

collectibles.title: Pageant Boy
effects: Spawns 7 random coins around Isaac on the floor.
Isaac wears a pink crown on his head.

collectibles.title: Scapular
effects: Once per room when you are damaged down to your final half a heart, you gain 1 soul heart.
Re-entering a room allows this effect to be triggered again.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Speed Ball
effects: +0.3 Speed Up.
+0.2 Shot Speed Up.
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: Bum Friend
effects: A beggar who follows Isaac around and automatically picks up nearby coins.
After picking up 6 coins he will drop a random pickup, e.g. hearts, keys, bombs, coins, pills, cards, trinkets etc.
After the first drop, he has a 67% chance to drop a pickup after 3 coins and a 33% chance to drop a pickup after 4 coins.
Counts as 1 of 3 bum items needed towards the Super Bum transformation.

collectibles.title: Guppy's Head
effects: When used, spawns between 2-4 blue flies.
Blue Flies do double your tear damage.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Gold Chest

collectibles.title: Prayer Card
effects: Gives Isaac an eternal heart when used.
Taking an eternal heart to the next floor or collecting two on the same floor gives you an extra heart container.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Notched Axe
effects: Each charge of this item allows Isaac to break all rocks, pots and secret room doors in the current room.
Cannot break the stone blocks which appear in the environment.
If Isaac is damaged while the effect is active, it will deactivate.

collectibles.title: Infestation
effects: When Isaac gets hit, 1-3 blue flies will randomly spawn.
Blue Flies do double your tear damage.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Ipecac
effects: Isaac's tears are replaced with explosive poison bombs, which will arc upwards and explode on contact with the floor, dealing huge damage and leaving a poison effect on enemies in range.
Ipecac shots are given a flat +40 Damage on top of the normal 3.5 base damage.
Tears Down (Tear delay * 2 + 10).
+13.0 Tear Height.
Shots will damage Isaac if he is in the blast radius when they explode.
Counts as 1 of 3 poison items needed towards the Bob transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 6 times.

collectibles.title: Tough Love
effects: Isaac has a random chance to fire a tooth shot instead of a tear sometimes.
Teeth shots deal damage equal to your tear damage * 3.2.
The chance to fire a tooth is affected by your luck stat and at +9 Luck it will activate every time.
Synergizes well with some tear modifiers such as Ipecac, which causes it to do massive damage.

collectibles.title: The Mulligan
effects: Isaac has a 1/6 chance to spawn a blue fly when one of his tears hits an enemy.
Blue Flies do double your tear damage.
The chance to activate this effect is not changed with your Luck stat.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Technology 2
effects: Isaac now also has a laser with unlimited range which fires continuously and does damage very rapidly.
-35% Damage Down (0.65 damage multiplier).
The laser can apply status effects (e.g. Poison) rapidly due to how often it hits.

collectibles.title: Mutant Spider
effects: Tears now shoot 4 at a time (Quad Shot)
Tears Down significantly (Tear delay * 2.1 + 3).
Synergizes well with a lot of tear effects - e.g. with Brimstone you get 4 lasers.
Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.

collectibles.title: Chemical Peel
effects: +2 Damage Up for tears fired from Isaac's left eye.
If playing as Cain or you have an item which modifies which eye you fire tears from, each shot has a 50% chance to do +2 Damage.

collectibles.title: The Peeper
effects: Gives Isaac an eye companion that floats around the room and deals 8 damage per tick on contact with enemies.

collectibles.title: Habit
effects: When you take damage, this item recharges one room's worth of charge to your spacebar item.
For example, with the D6 you would need to take damage 6 times to fully recharge it.
tags:
shop item pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Bloody Lust
effects: Each time you take damage, you gain a damage up which lasts for the rest of the floor and turn a darker red colour each time.
After taking 6 hits Bloody Lust doesn't give you any further damage increases.
Damage given for each hit increases as follows: +0.5, +0.5, +0.5, +33%, +33%, +33%.
The maximum effect is (damage + 1.5) * 2, resulting in more than double your original damage and stacking with other damage increasing items.
Samson starts with this item.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Samson.

collectibles.title: Crystal Ball
effects: Upon use, reveals the map and gives the player a random tarot card, mystic rune or soul heart.
Does not reveal the location of Secret or Super Secret rooms.
Has a chance to drop from playing a fortune machine.

collectibles.title: Spirit of the Night
effects: Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.

collectibles.title: Crack The Sky
effects: Creates 5 beams of light from the sky that deal damage equal to your tear damage + 20 to any enemies which come into contact with them.
In Afterbirth, the beams now have improved targetting and have a high chance to spawn on top of enemies where possible.

collectibles.title: Ankh
effects: Upon death, the player respawns as Blue Baby with three Soul hearts.
This is a one time use item and all new heart containers will be soul hearts.
Can be used to unlock some of Blue Baby's secrets before having the character available.

collectibles.title: Celtic Cross
effects: Upon taking damage, you have a 20% chance to gain an invulnerability shield for 7 seconds.
The chance to gain a shield is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Maggy.

collectibles.title: Ghost Baby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots spectral tears that deal 3.5 damage.
Ghost Baby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.

collectibles.title: The Candle
effects: A spacebar item which allows Isaac to fire a blue flame that damages anything in its path for 23 damage per tick.
Can cause up to a total of 276 potential damage.
The flame destroys enemy shots, making it useful for bullet hell bosses.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 900 coins to the Shop.

collectibles.title: Cat-O-Nine-Tails
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.23 Shot Speed Up.
An item only found in the Boss room pool.

collectibles.title: D20
effects: Upon use, re-rolls all pickup consumables in the current room into another random kind of pickup.
This includes all types of pickup such as hearts, bombs, keys, coins, pills, tarot cards, chests, trinkets etc.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Isaac.

collectibles.title: Harlequin Baby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots two normal tears at once in a V-shaped pattern.
Each of Harlequin Baby's tears deal 4 damage.
Harlequin Baby fires tears at a rate of 1 tear per second.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Epic Fetus
effects: Tears now become missiles which deal huge damage to anything nearby.
Missiles damage = damage * 20.
This item places a controllable red target on the ground which will cause a missile to fall from the sky and hit it after a short period of time.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #19 (The Family Man).

collectibles.title: Polyphemus
effects: High Damage Up - (damage + 4) * 2.
Tears Down significantly (Tear delay * 2.1 + 3).
If a tear kills an enemy, it continues to travel forward with the leftover damage.

collectibles.title: Daddy Longlegs
effects: A shadow follows Isaac and stomps on enemies randomly, dealing 40 damage per stomp (2 damage ticks at 20 damage each).

collectibles.title: Spider Butt
effects: Upon use, does 10 damage to all enemies in the room and gives them a slowing effect for 4 seconds.
Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.

collectibles.title: Sacrificial Dagger
effects: Gives Isaac an orbital knife that blocks shots and deals 15 damage per tick on contact with enemies.
The highest damage orbital in the game, dealing 225 damage per second.
Synergises very well with invulnerability items such as Book of Shadows.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eve.

collectibles.title: Mitre
effects: Gives a 50% chance of converting red heart drops into soul hearts.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Rainbow Baby
effects: A familiar the follows Isaac and fires random tears.
Rainbow Baby's tears can choose from any of the other familiars, such as homing, spectral, tar shots etc.

collectibles.title: Dad's Key
effects: Upon use, opens all closed doors in the current room, including the ones which require a key to enter and secret room doors.
Can be used to open the golden door that appears in the Dark Room or the Chest.
Cannot be used to escape the Mom's Foot boss, open angel/devil rooms, or open the door to the Blue Womb floor.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by collecting both Key Pieces #1 & #2 for the first time.

collectibles.title: Stem Cells
effects: +1 Health Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.

collectibles.title: Portable Slot
effects: Using the portable slot takes a coin and has a chance to give a pickup - similar to how the normal slot machines work.
tags:
coin judgement pool,
        shop room pool

collectibles.title: Holy Water
effects: When Isaac takes damage, the bottle breaks and leaves a pool on the floor which deals 8 damage per tick to enemies which walk over it.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Fate
effects: Gives Isaac an eternal heart and the ability to fly.
Taking an eternal heart to the next floor or collecting two on the same floor gives you an extra heart container.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Blue Baby.

collectibles.title: The Black Bean
effects: Upon taking damage, Isaac will fart, causing all enemies in close proximity to become poisoned.
Black Bean deals your tear damage for 6 ticks.

collectibles.title: White Pony
effects: Allows Isaac to fly while the White Pony is held.
While held, sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high. If your speed stat is already higher then that value is still used.
Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, becoming invulnerable during the charge and damaging enemies while also casting the effect of Crack The Sky.
The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact with enemies and the beams deal damage equal to your tear damage + 20.
Drops from the Conquest boss fight.

collectibles.title: Sacred Heart
effects: Tears are now white, do a lot more damage and move slower across the screen with a homing effect.
Health Up.
Damage Up (damage * 2.3 + 1).
-0.4 Tears Down.
-0.25 Shot Speed Down.
+4.125 Range Up.
+0.75 Tear Height.
Full red heart heal.

collectibles.title: Toothpicks
effects: +0.7 Tears Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up.
Does not increase your damage, simply makes your tears red.

collectibles.title: Holy Grail
effects: +1 Health Up
Gives Isaac the ability to fly.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.

collectibles.title: Dead Dove
effects: Gives Isaac the ability to fly and spectral tears.
An item only found in the Angel room.
Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.

collectibles.title: Blood Rights
collectibles.pickup: Mass enemy damage at a cost
effects: Upon use, takes away one full heart and deals 40 damage to the entire room.
With the Isaac's Heart item, you can use Blood Rights without taking damage.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Samson.

collectibles.title: Guppy's Hairball
effects: Follows behind Isaac and can be swung back and forth, dealing 5 contact damage per tick to anything it hits.
Every time the hairball kills an enemy, it grows in size allowing it to deal more damage.
This is one of the items which allows you to transform into Guppy.
Moving to a new floor decreases the size of the hairball.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.

collectibles.title: Abel
effects: A familiar that mirrors the player's movements and shoots tears directly at Isaac.
Abel's tears do the same as Isaac's base damage (3.5).
In larger rooms, Abel will mirror to the other side of the screen instead of the entire room.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Cain.

collectibles.title: SMB Super Fan
effects: Isaac turns red like Meatboy.
+1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.
+0.2 Tears Up.
+0.5 Range Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
+1.0 Tear Height.
Full red heart heal.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #14 (It's in the Cards).

collectibles.title: Pyro
effects: Gives Isaac 99 bombs.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Secret Room, Bomb Beggar

collectibles.title: 3 Dollar Bill
effects: Grants Isaac random tear effects.
The tear type changes every few seconds.

collectibles.title: Telepathy for Dummies
effects: When used, Isaac gains homing shots for the current room.
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transormation.
tags:
item room pool,
        yellow book how to

collectibles.title: MEAT!
effects: +1 Health Up.
+0.3 Damage Up.

collectibles.title: Magic 8 Ball
effects: +0.16 Shot Speed Up.
Gives Isaac a random tarot card when picked up.

collectibles.title: Mom's Coin Purse
effects: Drops 4 random pills on the floor around Isaac.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Shop, Boss Room, Challenge Room, Beggar, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: Squeezy
effects: +2 Soul Hearts.
+0.4 Tears Up.

collectibles.title: Jesus Juice
effects: +0.5 Damage Up.
+0.25 Range Up.
+0.5 Tear Height.

collectibles.title: Box
effects: When picked up, spawns 1 red heart, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 coin, 1 card/rune, 1 pill and 1 trinket.

collectibles.title: Mom's Key
effects: +2 Keys
Doubles the yield of hearts, coins, bombs and keys that spawn from non-red chests.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Mom's Eyeshadow
effects: Tears have a random chance to charm enemies.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.
The chance to charm enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Iron Bar
effects: +0.3 Damage Up.
Tears now have a chance to concuss enemies, causing them to walk around dazed and confused for a short period of time.
The chance to concuss enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.

collectibles.title: Midas Touch
effects: Isaac's touch now petrifies enemies, turning them to gold for a few seconds.
If an enemy is killed while it is golden, it will drop between 1-4 coins.
Contact damage is also dealt to enemies equal to the amount of coins Isaac is currently holding.
Has a synergy with The Poop item, which gives it a high chance to spawn golden poops.

collectibles.title: Humbleing Bundle
effects: All future pennies, keys, bombs and hearts will drop in pairs.
Does not work for other pickups, such as soul hearts, nickels, dimes, cards, pills etc.

collectibles.title: Fanny pack
effects: When you take damage, there is a 50% chance to drop a random heart, key, bomb or coin.

collectibles.title: Sharp plug
effects: When your spacebar item is out of charge, you can press spacebar to recharge it at the cost of 2 health.
Can't be used if your spacebar item has any number of charges on it.
This item only costs 1/2 a heart to use if you have The Wafer item.
The Sharp Plug will take health from Soul/Black hearts (if any) before taking red hearts.

collectibles.title: The Guillotine
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
-1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
Causes Isaac's head to detach and orbit his body, blocking shots and dealing 7 contact damage per tick.
BFFs will cause the Guillotine head to do double damage (14 damage per tick)
Tears are still fired from Isaac's head but the hitbox remains around his body.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Judas.

collectibles.title: Ball of Bandages
effects: Gives Isaac an orbital ball of bandages that deals 7 contact damage per tick and blocks enemy shots.
Collecting a second Ball of Bandages in the run turns the orbital into a pink head that shoots tears that deal 7 damage each and have a chance to charm enemies.
Getting a third Ball of Bandages will transform the head into bandage girl which will chase enemies dealing 3.5 contact damage per tick while firing charm tears.
A fourth Ball of Bandages will make the Bandage Girl bigger and stronger, making her deal 5.5 damage per tick instead.
Any further Ball of Bandages will repeat the cycle.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.

collectibles.title: Champion Belt
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
Increases the chance of champion enemies appearing by 15%.
Doesn't affect the chance for champion bosses to spawn.
An item only found in the Shop room pool.

collectibles.title: Butt Bombs
effects: +5 bombs.
Bombs now become poop bombs, which deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time.
Butt Bombs heal the poop bosses (Dingle, Dangle, Brownie) by 25% of their max HP.

collectibles.title: Gnawed Leaf
effects: If Isaac stands still and stops shooting for a second, he turns to stone, making him invincible until he moves/shoots again.
Using bombs or your active item will remove the invicibility as well.
This item is a reference to the Tanuki suit in Super Mario 3.

collectibles.title: Spider Baby
effects: Spawns 1-2 friendly attack spiders every time you take damage.
Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.

collectibles.title: Guppy's Collar
effects: When Isaac dies, he has a 50% chance to resurrect with 1/2 a heart.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest

collectibles.title: Lost Contact
effects: All of Isaac's tears now have a shield, allowing them to block an enemy projectile.
If a tear blocks something, both Isaac's and the enemies tears are destroyed.
If a tear blocks something, both Isaac's and the enemies tears are destroyed.
-0.16 Shot Speed Down.

collectibles.title: Anemic
effects: +5 Range Up.
When Isaac takes damage, he will start to leave a trail of blood creep behind him as he walks for the current room. The creep deals 2 damage per tick while enemies stand in it.
Lazarus' revived form (Lazarus II) respawns with this item.

collectibles.title: Goat Head
effects: Gives Isaac a guaranteed devil or angel room on every floor that they can appear, even if you have already beaten the boss and it didn't show up originally.
Taking the Goat Head (or any other item) in a Devil Deal bars you from encountering Angel Rooms naturally. After which, the only way to access an Angel Room is via the Sacrifice Room.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Golden Chest

collectibles.title: Ceremonial Robes
effects: +3 Black Hearts.
+1 Damage Up.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: Mom's Wig
effects: Isaac now has a small chance to create friendly attack spiders everytime he fires a tear.
Can create up to a maximum of 5 spiders in the room at one time.
The Hive Mind item allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once, and increases their damage.
The chance to create a spider is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time.
Heals you for 1 red heart when picked up.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Placenta
effects: +1 Health Up.
Gives a chance to heal 1/2 a red heart every 60 seconds.
There are no restrictions on when the regeneration effect happens as long as the game is not paused, so you can simply afk and heal over time.
Works in crawl spaces.
It's possible to find this item by blowing up Polyps (the weird red rocks found in the Womb floors)

collectibles.title: Old Bandage
effects: +1 Health Up.
The given heart container is empty.
When you get hit, you will sometimes cause hearts to drop on the floor.
The chance to drop hearts is affected by your luck stat and at +29 Luck it will activate 50% of the time.

collectibles.title: Sad Bombs
effects: +5 Bombs
Everytime a bomb explodes, it will release a circle of 10 tears outwards, much like the Tammy's Head effect.
The tears from each bomb deal a flat 25 damage and are affected by any tear modifiers Isaac has.
The tears caused by Sad Bombs are much larger and do a lot more damage than Isaac's normal tears.

collectibles.title: Rubber Cement
effects: Isaac's tears now bounce off walls and objects in the environment, such as rocks and pots.
Allows tears to hit the same enemy multiple times.
If you also have Lost Contact, tears will bounce off enemy projectiles instead of being destroyed.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's heart 2 times.

collectibles.title: Anti-Gravity
effects: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
As you hold down the fire button, shots will float in the same place until you release the fire key again.
Allows you to store up a lot of tears in the air and release them all at once.
When the tears are released, they will fire off in the direction that Isaac was originally facing when it was created.

collectibles.title: Pyromaniac
effects: +5 Bombs
All explosions now heal Isaac for 1 heart instead of hurting him.
Isaac will also be immune to other sources such as Mom's leg stomp, Satan's leg stomp.

collectibles.title: Cricket's Body
effects: -1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
-10.0 Range Down.
x1.2 Tear Size.
Makes tears break into 4 smaller tears on impact with anything, which deal half of your damage.

collectibles.title: Gimpy
effects: When getting hit, this item has a chance to drop a soul heart or black heart.
The chance to spawn a heart is affected by your luck stat and at +22 Luck it will activate 50% of the time.
Enemies have a chance to drop half a red heart when killed.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: Black Lotus
effects: +1 Health Up.
+1 Soul Heart.
+1 Black Heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item only found in the secret room pool.

collectibles.title: Piggy Bank
effects: +3 Coins when picked up.
When you take damage, 1-2 coins will drop on the floor.
When playing as the Keeper, this item drops 0-1 coins instead.

collectibles.title: Mom's Perfume:
effects: -1 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
Isaac's tears have a 15% chance of causing a fear effect.
Feared enemies will run away from Isaac temporarily.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Monstro's Lung
effects: Tears can now be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack.
Tears down (Tear delay * 4.3).
Partial charging does nothing - must be fully charged to use.

collectibles.title: Abaddon
collectibles.pickup: Evil up + DMG up + fear shot
effects: On pickup removes all of your red hearts and gives you 6 black hearts.
+1.5 Damage Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
Tears now have a chance to induce the fear effect, causing enemies to run away from Isaac for a short period.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Azazel.

collectibles.title: Ball of Tar
effects: Isaac leaves a trail of tar behind him which will slow down enemies that walk over it.
Tears have a chance to slow enemies and their projectiles for a short period of time.
The chance to slow enemies can improve based on your luck stat and will always slow enemies at +18 Luck.

collectibles.title: Stop Watch
collectibles.pickup: Let's slow this down a bit
effects: +0.3 Speed Up.
After you get hit the Stop Watch applies a slowing effect for the rest of the room to all enemies and their projectiles.
The effect will still activate when hit while the Holy Mantle effect is active.
The slowing effect has a reduced effect against Brimstone lasers fired by enemies.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 999 pennies to the Shop.

collectibles.title: Tiny Planet
effects: +7.0 Tear Height.
Range greatly increased.
Tears now revolve around Isaac's Body at a fixed distance until they hit the ground.
Aiming in the opposite direction is often better due to how the tears circle around Isaac.
Causes a lot of great synergies with items such as Lump of Coal, Brimstone, Rubber Cement, Technology and most of the worm trinkets.

collectibles.title: Infestation 2
effects: Creates a friendly blue spider when you kill an enemy.
Spiders are spawned at the location where the enemy died.

collectibles.title: E. Coli
effects: E. Coli turns normal enemies into poop if they touch you.
Enemies can turn into poop even if they do not do contact damage, allowing you to apply the effect without taking damage.
Can be combined with Midas Touch to turn enemies into Golden Poop.
This does not work on mini-bosses and bosses.
Counts as 1 of 3 poop items needed towards the Oh Crap transformation.

collectibles.title: Death's Touch
effects: +1.5 Damage Up.
-0.3 Tears Down.
x2 Tear Size.
Isaac's tears turn into large scythes that pierce through enemies (Similar to how Death's scythes look).
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #17 (Waka Waka).

collectibles.title: Key Piece #1
effects: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.
First half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.

collectibles.title: Key Piece #2
effects: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.
Second half of the key required to enter the door to the Mega Satan boss.
Drops from one of the angels which appear by bombing the statue in an angel room.

collectibles.title: Experimental Treatment
collectibles.pickup: All stats up! ... and then shuffled
effects: Randomly increases 4 of your stats, and decreases 2 of them
Possible stat changes are fixed values: 1 health, 1 damage, 0.2 speed, 0.5 range, 0.5 tears, 0.2 shot speed, 1 luck.
Counts as 1 of 3 syringe items needed towards the Spun transformation.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Boss Room, Demon Beggar
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart 7 times.

collectibles.title: Contract From Below
effects: Doubles pickups and chests from clearing a room.
Also gives a 30% chance for room clear rewards to not spawn.
Doesn't affect coins spawned in Greed Mode.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar

collectibles.title: Infamy
effects: Gives a 50% chance to not take damage from projectiles.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Gold Chest, Secret Room

collectibles.title: Trinity Shield
effects: Puts a shield in front of Isaac which blocks projectiles.
The shield will rotate based on the direction in which Isaac is firing tears.

collectibles.title: Tech.5
effects: Gives Isaac a laser that will fire at random intervals in addition to your normal tears.
Each laser does damage equal to your current tear damage.
The laser will occasionally fire with one of these effects: Hook Worm, Spoon Bender, Tiny Planet, Mysterious Liquid, Rubber Cement.
Luck has no effect on the rate at which Tech.5 fires and does not scale with items that increase your tears stat.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #18 (The Host).

effects: Isaac now shoots two tears at once.
Unlike the Inner Eye and Mutant Spider items, this double shot item does not give a tears down, effectively giving you double damage per second potential.

collectibles.title: Blue Map
effects: Reveals the locations of the secret and super secret room for the current floor and all future floors.
tags:
shop room pool,
        shop item pool
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 10 pennies to the Shop.

collectibles.title: BFFS!
effects: Makes all of Isaac's familiars stronger and bigger.
Causes most familiars to deal double damage.
Has no effect on most familiars that scale with Isaac's tear damage.

collectibles.title: Hive Mind
effects: Causes your friendly blue spiders and flies to become bigger and do 2x more damage.
Allows Mom's Wig to spawn a maximum of 10 spiders at once instead of 5.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: There's Options
effects: Two items now spawn after beating a boss fight and the boss rush, however only one can be taken.
The additional item will pick from the Boss Item Pool.
Does nothing after the Krampus fight.
Unlocked by donating to the donation machine in the shop.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 50 pennies to the Shop.

collectibles.title: Bogo Bombs
effects: All bomb pickups are now 1+1 bombs.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.

collectibles.title: Starter Deck
effects: Spawns a random card.
Isaac can now hold 2 cards or runes at once. Tap the drop button to cycle between each one
All future pill drops will now instead become cards.
An item only available in the Shop room.

collectibles.title: Little Baggy
effects: Allows for 2 pills to be held. Tap the drop button to cycle between each one
Drops a pill on the floor when picked up.
Changes all card and rune drops into pills. Any Tarot card or rune on the floor or current held when picking this item up will change into a pill.
Dice Shard counts as a card and will be converted.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by picking up 2 of the following items: Roid Rage, The Virus, Growth Hormones, Experimental Treatment or Speed Ball.

collectibles.title: Magic Scab
effects: +1 Health Up.
+1.0 Luck Up.

collectibles.title: Blood Clot
effects: +1.0 Damage Up (Left eye only).
+5 Range Up (Left eye only).
The above stats only apply to tears fired from Isaac's left eye or with a 50% chance if you have an item which causes you to fire from a single source only.

collectibles.title: Screw
effects: +0.5 Tears Up
+0.2 Shot Speed Up

collectibles.title: Hot Bombs
effects: +5 Bombs
Gives all bombs a burning effect when they explode, leaving fire on the floor which deals 22 damage to enemies.

collectibles.title: Fire Mind
effects: Isaac's tears now set enemies on fire, leaving a damage over time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
There is a chance that tears that hit enemies will explode, leaving a small fire on the floor that damages enemies.
Exploding tears deal damage * 2 + 22 per tick.
The chance for tears to explode is affected by your luck stat and at +13 Luck it will activate every time.

collectibles.title: Missing No.
effects: When picked up, and at the start of each floor this rerolls all your current items, giving you a new item to replace each of the ones you had.
Also rerolls all your stats at the same time, giving a random flat modifier that changes each time.
Doesn't affect important items such as Polaroid, Negative and Key Pieces.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Lazarus.

collectibles.title: Dark Matter
effects: +1.0 Damage Up.
Tears now have a chance to apply the fear effect to enemies, which causes them to run away from Isaac.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +20 Luck it will activate every time.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)

collectibles.title: Black Candle
effects: +1 Black Heart.
Immunity to all floor curses (e.g. Curse of the Lost)
Black Candle removes the teleportation effect of Cursed Eye.
+15% chance of a devil or angel room opening after the boss fight.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 150 pennies to the Shop.

collectibles.title: Proptosis
effects: Gives Isaac high damage tears with a short range.
Tear size and damage falls off very fast with this item, the further the tear travels the less damage it does.
Tear damage starts at double (+100%) and decreases over range to roughly (+30%).
Despite the very small tears visually, Proptosis is always a damage up at any range for tears. However with lasers such as Brimstone this point is no longer true.

collectibles.title: Missing Page 2
collectibles.pickup: Evil up + your enemies will pay
effects: +1 Black Heart.
If the total sum of all your health is at one heart after taking damage, the necronomicon effect will activate, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Demon Beggar, Secret Room

collectibles.title: Smart Fly
effects: A yellow orbital fly that will block shots and when Isaac gets hit, will seek out the nearest enemy and attack it.
If the fly is in its attacking state and there are no longer any enemies in range, it will return to Isaac and go back to being a defensive orbital.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Dry Baby
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and blocks any shots that hit it.
If a projectile is blocked by Dry Baby, he has a 10% chance to activate the Necronomicon effect, dealing 40 damage to the entire room.
The chance to activate the effect is not changed by your Luck stat.
Can drop while destroying skulls in the Depths and Necropolis floors.

collectibles.title: Juicy Sack
effects: A familiar that follows isaac around dropping white creep which slows down enemies that walk over it.
Spawns 1-2 familiar blue spiders after every room.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.

collectibles.title: Robo-Baby 2.0
collectibles.pickup: We worked out all the kinks
effects: A familiar that is controlled via the arrow keys and will automatically fire a laser if anything is in its line of sight.
Robo-Baby 2.0's lasers deal 3.5 damage per hit.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #16 (Computer Savvy).

collectibles.title: Rotten Baby
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and spawns a blue flies as you're firing tears.
Rotten Baby can only create one fly at a time, meaning if he has created a fly he cannot make another until it is used.
Blue Flies do double your tear damage.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Headless Baby
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and leaves blood creep on the floor as it floats, hurting enemies that walk over it for 2 damage per tick.
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Leech
effects: Spawns a familiar leech on the ground that hunts down enemies and heals you for half a heart each time it eats one.
The Leech deals 1.5 contact damage per tick.

collectibles.title: Mystery Sack
effects: A bag that follows Isaac and drops a random heart, coin, bomb or key every 5-6 rooms (alternating, 5 rooms then 6, then repeats).
Can drop any kind of heart, coin, bomb or key.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eden.

collectibles.title: BBF
effects: A large familiar black fly that bounces around the room, exploding on contact with enemies dealing 70 damage.
Does not explode if it hits Isaac, however if it explodes on an enemy while Isaac is in range, he will take damage.
Respawns after 10 seconds or by moving to another room.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Bob's Brain
effects: A green brain that launches in the direction you are firing your tears and will explode on contact with enemies, dealing damage and poisoning anything in the blast radius.
Bob's Brain deals 60 damage and applies a poison damage over time effect, which deals double your tear damage per tick.
Regenerates over time.
Will hurt Isaac if he is in the blast radius.
Counts as 1 of 3 poison items needed towards the Bob transformation.

collectibles.title: Best Bud
effects: When Isaac takes damage, a white attack fly will spawn that orbits him at a similar distance to the Distant Admiration fly.
The fly orbits a lot faster than Distant Admiration or Forever Alone and deals 5 damage per tick.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.
tags:
item room pool,
        the lost item pool

collectibles.title: Lil Brimstone
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and can fire up and charge brimstone shots, exactly how the normal Brimstone item works but with less damage.
Each laser deals 3.5 damage per tick, up to 9 times for a total of 31.5 damage.
A familiar found in the devil room.

collectibles.title: Isaac's Heart
effects: Prevents Isaac from taking any damage, but instead summons a familiar heart that follows you around. If the heart is hit, Isaac will take damage.
Most enemies will target the heart over Isaac himself.
Blood donation machines and devil beggars can be used for free. Spikes and Curse Rooms no longer deal damage.
Sharp Plug becomes useless with this item, due to how damage is prevented on Isaac's body.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with The Lost.

collectibles.title: Lil Haunt
effects: A familiar ghost that follows Isaac around and chases enemies close-by, damaging them for 2 contact damage and causing a fear effect.

collectibles.title: Dark Bum
collectibles.pickup: He wants to take your life
effects: A familiar beggar similar to Bum Friend that follows Isaac and collects red hearts, giving Isaac soul hearts or spiders in return.
For every 1.5 red hearts he takes, he will give 1 heart/spider in return.
Soul hearts are the most common payout with only a small chance to spawn friendly, hostile spiders or black hearts.
Counts as 1 of 3 bum items needed towards the Super Bum transformation.

collectibles.title: Big Fan
effects: A very large orbital that moves around Isaac very slowly, blocking shots and dealing 2 contact damage per tick.
Affects the speed of all other orbitals, slowing them down a lot (NOTE: This effect does not happen until you get a new orbital after Big Fan).
Does not count as one of your three standard orbital slots.
Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation.

collectibles.title: Sissy Long Legs
effects: An adorable friendly blue spider that walks around the room laying other blue spiders which attack enemies.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
She can only spawn a maximum of up to 5 spiders at a time and will only do so while there are enemies in the room.

collectibles.title: Punching Bag
effects: Spawns a friendly Mulligan that walks around the room. Mulligan can be hit by enemy projectiles, making him a good shield.
Enemies will sometimes target the Mulligan if he is closer.

collectibles.title: How To Jump
effects: When used, makes Isaac leap in the air, similar to the leaper enemies.
Maintains momentum if you are already moving in the same direction.
If you already have an item which gives you flying, this item becomes a dash effect instead.
Can be used in the Isaac boss fight to jump over the beams of light he spawns.

collectibles.title: D100
effects: When used, rerolls each item you currently own into another item room pool item and any pedestal items and pickups in the room.
Has the combined uses of the D4, D6 and D20.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with The Lost.

collectibles.title: D4
effects: When used, the D4 re-rolls each item you currently have into another random item from the same item pool.
If you have an item with no room pool (e.g. Blood Bag) it will be rerolled into a random Item Room item.
Each time an item is generated by the D4, it is also removed from the pool. When the pool is empty, it will eventually re-roll all your items into heart containers.
Cannot remove Azazel's Brimstone laser.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 30 slot machines.

collectibles.title: D10
effects: When used, rerolls all enemies in the room which are currently alive into another random type of enemy from any floor.
Dangerous to use in early floors, it could replace a basement enemy with something usually found in the Womb only.
Cannot reroll mini-bosses or bosses.

collectibles.title: Blank Card
effects: When used, copies the effect of the card or rune you are currently holding without consuming it.
Doesn't work with pills.
Allows game breaking combinations with the Jera rune by chaining batteries and pickups and using it multiple times.
An item that often appears in the shop.
Using this with the ? card will teleport you to the I AM ERROR room.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eden.

collectibles.title: Book of Secrets
effects: When used, you have a chance of getting one of the three following effects: Treasure Map (floor layout), Compass (map icons) or Blue Map (secret room locations)
Counts as 1 of 3 book items needed towards the Bookworm transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Eden.

collectibles.title: Box of Spiders
effects: When used, spawns 1-4 friendly blue spiders on the floor.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.

collectibles.title: Red Candle
effects: Allows you to fire a red flame infront of you, similar to the Blue Candle item, however the flame will stay for the current room.
Each flame deals 125 total damage before it disappears.
The flame will shrink in size when deals damage to something and eventually disappear.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 400 pennies to the Shop.

collectibles.title: The Jar
effects: Isaac can now pick up hearts while at full health, which will be stored in the Jar and can be spawned again using the spacebar.
Up to 4 hearts can be stored in The Jar.
Soul hearts and black hearts cannot be stored.
