Every time this item deals damage, it has a 15% chance to drop 1/2 red hearts or 1/2 soul hearts.
Half red hearts will always drop when the player has at least one red heart container, otherwise half soul hearts will drop.

collectibles.title: Mom's Razor
effects: A razor blade orbital that deals contact damage and applies the bleeding status effect to enemies, which will cause them to take damage equal to 10% of their total health every 5 seconds
The contact damage dealt by Mom's Razor is equal to 20% of your current tear damage (scales with damage upgrades)
Does not block enemy shots
The bleed effect does not affect bosses
Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item
Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation.

collectibles.title: Bloodshot Eye
effects: An eye orbital that shoots a tear every 2 seconds that deals 3.5 damage and deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies
Tears will fire in the direction it is currently facing and do not target enemies
Unlike other orbitals, this item does not block enemy projectiles
The damage dealt by this orbital does not scale with damage upgrades
Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

collectibles.title: Delirious
effects: When used, spawns a charmed random white delirium version of a boss, that will fight for you and kill other enemies for the rest of the current room
Possible bosses spawned include most bosses in the game
Some bosses' effects can harm Isaac. For example if the spawned boss leaves creep, it can damage Isaac
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium for the first time on any character

collectibles.title: Angry Fly
effects: A familiar fly that orbits around a random enemy in the room until that enemy dies, dealing 2 contact damage to other enemies
Angry Fly will move to the next enemy after the one it is currently orbiting dies, until the room is cleared, at which point it will return to orbiting Isaac
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by transforming into Beelzebub (Achieved by picking up 3 fly related items, see Transformations page for full list).

collectibles.title: Black Hole
effects: A throwable active item that places a black hole on the ground where it lands, sucking all enemies into it for 6 seconds
Enemies stuck inside the black hole take rapid damage over time
The Black Hole will also suck Isaac into it, but with a much weaker effect than to enemies
The Black Hole will destroy nearby obstacles such as rocks and pots
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase

collectibles.title: Bozo
effects: +0.1 Damage Up
+1 Soul Heart
Adds a random chance for an enemy in the current room to become charmed or feared briefly
Adds a random chance to spawn a rainbow poop upon taking damage
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Electoon
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by breaking 5 rainbow poops.

collectibles.title: Broken Modem
effects: Causes random enemies to 'lag' at random intervals, causing them to freeze in place for a second
The lag effect can also apply to tears, projectiles and consumables on the ground
While held, this trinket has a 25% chance to double up any end of room drops (similar to the Contract from Below effect)
Isaac's Luck stat affects how often the lag effect occurs
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Freezenification
collectibles.unlock: Complete 7 Daily Challenges (30 on console)

collectibles.title: Mystery Gift
effects: A one-time use item that spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance for it to spawn Lump of Coal or The Poop instead
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Mills

collectibles.title: Sprinkler
effects: When used, spawns a Sprinkler that rotates in a circle, spraying tears in all directions.
Will also synergize with some other items, such as Mom's Eye, Brimstone, Dr. Fetus, Tech X or Loki's Horns
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Kieran and Stewartisme

collectibles.title: Fast Bombs
effects: +7 Bombs
Allows you to rapidly place bombs on the ground
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Lil Horn 20 times.

collectibles.title: Buddy in a Box
effects: When picked up, gives Isaac a random familiar which has a random sprite and tear effect
The familiar will be fully randomized again upon entering the next floor
The appearance is chosen from a random co-op baby sprite
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

collectibles.title: Lil Delirium
effects: A familiar that will transform into another random familiar every 10 seconds, copying their behaviour and effect
Can be any other familiar, including (but not limited to) Lil Brimstone, Bob's Brain, BBF, Meatboy, Rotten Baby
Familiars appear as a white Delirium version of the original
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

collectibles.title: Jumper Cables
effects: This item gives you 1 bar of charge on your active item for every 15 enemies you kill
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by picking up any 3 of these items in a single run: 9 Volt, The Battery, Car Battery, AAA Battery, Watch Battery.

collectibles.title: Coupon
effects: When used, the coupon causes one random item in the shop to become free
While held, guarantees a random item or pickup from the shop to be half price
The effect of this item also works in Devil Rooms, allowing you to take one random item for free
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Plumbo

collectibles.title: Telekinesis
effects: An active that causes all enemy tears to be held in place and then thrown back away from Isaac for a period of 3 seconds
Has a recharge time of about 2 seconds
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: Moving Box
effects: When used, the box will pick up a maximum of 6 items. Using the box again will put the picked up items back on the floor again, allowing you to move things between rooms
Can move any of the following: Batteries, Items, Trinkets, Hearts, Keys, Bombs, Coins, Chests and more
Using Moving Box with Car Battery will trigger 2 interactions at the same time: First it will drop all items currently inside the box and secondly will then pick up the current room's contents.
When used in a room with 2 items you can choose from (e.g. There's Options, Double item room, Boss Rush) the Moving Box will pick only one of the items at random
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by HurleyFarrill
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by using Pandora's Box in the Dark Room floor.

collectibles.title: Technology Zero
effects: Your tears will now be connected together by beams of electricity which deals damage to enemies they hit
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by having 2 technology items at once.

collectibles.title: Leprosy
effects: Taking damage will spawn an orbital that rotates around Isaac, dealing contact damage to enemies and blocking enemy projectiles
A maximum of 3 Leprocy orbitals can be active at one time
Using the orbital to deal damage to enemies can cause it to break
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2. Based loosely on the Steam Workshop mod created by Extreme Ninja Home Makeover with changes by Edmund McMillen
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: 7 Seals
effects: Gives you a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds.
Each harbinger behaves differently, based on any of the original 5 horsemen bosses
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by by Scayze and Ashkait

collectibles.title: Mr. ME!
effects: Upon use, this item summons a ghost near Isaac that will follow him around. Also summons a blue crosshair which can be moved around freely. After a few seconds, the crosshair will disappear, and the Ghost will do certain things based on what you targeted:

Items, pickups, trinkets: Brings them to Isaac. Works in shops and devil deals as well, allowing you to take them for no cost. Stealing an item has a chance to fail (a buzzer sound will play if it fails)
Buttons: Presses the button
Enemies: Attacks the enemy until either the ghost or the enemy dies
Doors: Opens the door, even if it is locked
Secret room entrances: Explodes and opens the entrance
Boss rush door: Will open the Boss Rush door from either side, allowing you get into and escape the Boss Rush.
Slot machines, dead shopkeepers: Charges towards them and explodes them
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Jean-Alphonse
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by opening 20 locked chests.

collectibles.title: Angelic Prism
effects: Grants a prism orbital with a large orbital radius
Isaac's tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears
Does not deal contact damage to enemies that it passes over
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by electoon and Erfly

collectibles.title: Pop!
effects: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other
Issac's tears are no longer limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Scayze and Ashkait

collectibles.title: Death's List
effects: Upon entering a room, a skull appears over a random enemy's head.
Killing the marked enemy will cause the skull to move to a different enemy.

If all enemies in the room are cleared in the order they are marked, Isaac gains a random reward from one of the following: Soul heart, Key, Pill, Bomb, Nickel, +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Range, +0.5 Tears, +1 Flat damage or +1 luck
Killing enemies in the wrong order will end the streak and deny you any extra rewards.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Merlo.

collectibles.title: Haemolacria
effects: With Haemolacria, Isaac's tears become bloody and now fire by in the air in an arc.
Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle or enemy, the bloody tear will burst and fire lots of smaller tears at random directions around the impact point
Tears Down - (Tear delay * 2) + 10
Your damage stat is unaffected by this item, however the large bloody tear does +31% of your tear damage and the smaller scattering tears deal 50-80% of your tear damage.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Water Balloon) created by HiHowAreYou.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by picking up the Blood Clot item 10 times.

collectibles.title: Lachryphagy
effects: Isaac's tears slow down over time while moving across the room, and upon stopping completely or hitting an object will burst into 8 smaller tears which fire in all directions.
This item will also allow you to 'feed' a tear with other tears. Doing so will cause it to increase in size, and also increase their damage and the damage of the burst tears.
Once a tear is fed 5 times, it will immediately burst
Tears in the burst will deal half the damage the main tear would have.
Tears which hit an enemy do not burst
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Hungry Tears) created by Echo

collectibles.title: Trisagion
effects: Isaac's tears are replaced with piercing holy flashes of light, which travel across the room in a similar speed to regular tears.
Trisagion tears deal roughly 33% of your usual tear damage, however due to the size of the holy flash it is likely to hit enemies multiple times
Trisagion tears cause no knockback on enemies and simply travel through them (piercing tears)
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Lightshot) created by Wyvern and TRPG

collectibles.title: Schoolbag
effects: Gives you an extra active item slot
Pressing the CTRL key allows you to switch active items
Functions exactly the same as the Antibirth item with the same name
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by entering every Shop from the first floor up to Mom's Heart (Depths 2).

collectibles.title: Blanket
effects: +1 Soul Heart
Heals 1 red heart when picked up
Grants you a shield when entering the Boss Room, which prevents damage from 1 hit, then disappears
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ratlah
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by sleeping in 10 different beds.

collectibles.title: Sacrificial Altar
effects: When used, this item will sacrifice up to 2 of your familiars (chosen at random), and spawn a random Devil Room item for each familar sacrificed this way
In addition to the familiars, any blue flies or spiders will be converted to 1 coin each.
If Guardian Angel, Sworn Protector, or Seraphim is sacrificed, Satan will be extra happy and reward you with 2 black hearts.
Incubus won't be sacrificed if you're playing as Lilith
If used while you have no familiar, this item will do nothing and won't consume the item
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Niro

collectibles.title: Lil Spewer
effects: A familiar with a charged attack, that spawns a line of creep on the floor which damages enemies that walk over it
Spawns 1 random pill when picked up
The familiar and its creep will change randomly when Isaac uses a pill.

Possible creep types include green (deals damage), black (slows enemies), red (deals damage, forms a line with a larger puddle), yellow (deals damage, forms a short-range cone) and white (slows enemies, forms a ring)
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by dying to your own Ipecac explosion.

collectibles.title: Marbles
effects: Spawns 3 random trinkets when picked up
Upon taking damage, you have a random chance to consume one of your currently held trinkets, gaining its effect permanently
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Amethyst
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by using 5 Gulp! pills in one run.

collectibles.title: Mystery Egg
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and, upon taking damage, will spawn a charmed enemy that will fight for you
When the charmed enemy is spawned the egg will crack, but regenerate in the next room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by spawning 3 charmed enemies in a single room.

collectibles.title: Flat Stone
effects: Flat Stone causes your tears to bounce across the room
Whenever a tear bounces, it deals splash damage to nearby enemies for 25% of your tear damage
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Maddogs
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by picking up Rubber Cement 5 times.

collectibles.title: Marrow
effects: +1 Bone Heart
Spawns 3 red hearts on the ground when picked up
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Mom's Heart on hard mode as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Slipped Rib
effects: This item gives you an orbital, which will reflect projectiles back at enemies
Unlike some other orbitals, Slipped Rib doesn't deal contact damage to enemies
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating the Isaac boss as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Hallowed Ground
effects: A familiar which follows Isaac and spawns a white poop when you take damage
The white poop gives an aura that cuts your tear delay in half (Tears up) and has a chance to block damage
The aura disappears if the poop is destroyed
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Hush as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Pointy Rib
effects: A familiar that can be aimed with the fire buttons similar to the Finger item, dealing contact damage to enemies equal to your tear damage
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Satan as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Book of the Dead
effects: When used, this item will spawn a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room.
The orbitals and charmed enemies persist when travelling between rooms.
Bone orbitals break after dealing enough damage or blocking too many shots.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Dad's Ring
effects: A passive item that puts a yellow ring around Isaac. Enemies are frozen in place while touching the yellow ring
Enemies touching the ring will stay permanently frozen until you move away, except for bosses which only get a temporary freeze effect after touching it
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Ultra Greedier as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Divorce Papers
effects: +1 Bone Heart
+0.7 Tears Up
When you pick this item up, the Mysterious Paper trinket is spawned on the ground
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Boss Rush as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Jaw Bone
effects: A familiar that flies across the room every few seconds while firing and damages enemies (2x your tear damage)
Can also be used like the Boomerang to pick up consumables on the ground
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating ??? in The Chest floor as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Brittle Bones
effects: When picked up, this item replaces all of your red heart containers with 6 Bone Hearts
Every time you lose a bone heart, lots of bones fire in all directions damaging any enemies hit and you gain a permanent +0.5 Tears Up
For the Lost and Keeper characters, this item simply gives a permanent Tears Up.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in the Dark Room floor as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Broken Shovel
effects: Obtained by beating the Basement 1 boss within 1 minute, then bombing the large shadow that appears in the middle of the starting room
While held, Mom's Foot will stomp on you from above twice every few seconds, and she will continue to stomp for as long as you hold this item.
Using the Broken Shovel will stop Mom stomping you for the rest of the current room (or current wave if you're in the boss rush or challenge room).
Beating the Boss Rush while holding this item will drop the second half of the Broken Shovel, which combine to create Mom's Shovel, which is used to unlock The Forgotten character
Dropping the Broken Shovel will cause it to disappear if you leave the room
NOTE: This item will not drop unless you have beaten The Lamb at least once
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5 and used in the quest to unlock The Forgotten character

collectibles.title: Broken Shovel
effects: Drops after beating the Boss Rush while holding the other half of the Broken Shovel (see previous item for more details)
Combines with the first Broken Shovel piece to create Mom's Shovel (see next item for more details)
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5 and used in the quest to unlock The Forgotten character

collectibles.title: Mom's Shovel
effects: When used, spawns a trapdoor that leads to the next floor (has a 10% chance to be a crawl space instead)
Unlocks The Forgotten character when used on a mound of dirt that appears in a room in The Dark Room floor

Obtained by combining the two Broken Shovel pieces. The first piece drops by beating the first floor boss within 1 minute then bombing the shadow in the first room. The second piece drops after beating the Boss Rush as long as you are holding the first Broken Shovel piece (see previous 2 items for full details).
After The Forgotten is unlocked, using it on the mound of dirt again just spawns a random type of chest
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5 and used in the quest to unlock The Forgotten character

collectibles.title: Mucormycosis
effects: Enemies now explode upon death
Other enemies caught in the explosion become poisoned

collectibles.title: 2Spooky
effects: Any enemies that come within close range of Isaac will become feared, which causes them to flee

collectibles.title: Golden Razor
effects: When used, this item takes away 5 of your coins and gives a +1.2 Damage Up that lasts for the current room.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: Sulfur
effects: Upon use, grants use of Brimstone for the current room.
If used twice in the same room, the brimstone laser becomes massive and deals double damage.
More than two activations in the same room gives no further benefit.

collectibles.title: Fortune Cookie
effects: Upon use, displays a random fortune and has a chance to drop either a soul heart, tarot card, rune or trinket.

collectibles.title: Eye Sore
effects: With each tear fired, you have a chance to fire up to three extra tears in random directions.

collectibles.title: 120 Volt
effects: This item will fire electricity at nearby enemies, dealing roughly 135% of your tear damage rapidly.
The electricity can chain onto other nearby enemies if they are close enough.

collectibles.title: It Hurts
effects: Taking damage causes Isaac to fire a circle of tears around him (similar to the Tammy's Head effect)
After taking damage, you also gain a Tears Up (fire rate increase) for the rest of the current room

collectibles.title: Almond Milk
collectibles.pickup: DMG down + tears up + you feel nutty
effects: Greatly increases tears (fire rate)
Greatly decreases damage (0.3 damage multiplier)
Individual tears gain random worm effects (e.g. Hook Worm, Wiggle Worm etc.)

collectibles.title: Rock Bottom
effects: Resets all of your stats back to their original values
Prevents stats from being reduced any more for the rest of the run
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Nancy Bombs
effects: +5 Bombs
Bombs now explode with a random effect (e.g. Poison, Homing)

collectibles.title: A Bar of Soap
effects: +0.5 Tears Up
+0.2 Shot Speed Up

collectibles.title: Blood Puppy
effects: Spawns a red worm familiar that chases enemies nearby around the room and deals 2 contact damage per tick.

collectibles.title: Dream Catcher
effects: During the transition between floors, this item shows you a preview of the item that will spawn in the item room, and the boss that will appear

collectibles.title: Paschal Candle
effects: Gives -1 tear delay (tears up) for each room completed without taking damage, up to a maximum of -6
When you take damage, all stat upgrades given by this item are reset

collectibles.title: Divine Intervention
effects: Allows you to double-tap the shoot button to create a holy shield that pushes enemies back and deals 10 damage to them if they touch it.
The shield also reflects enemy shots back at them for some extra damage.
Can only be activated every 3 seconds (Shown by a white glow and a ticking noise).

collectibles.title: Blood Oath
effects: At the beginning of each new floor, this item will stab Isaac and reduce your red health down to half a heart, but give a damage and speed up
If Isaac is already at half a red heart when stabbed, no damage or speed increases are given
The damage from being stabbed can be avoided with invincibility, however no damage or speed stat increases are gained if you do

collectibles.title: Playdough Cookie
effects: Your individual tears each gain a random effect (e.g. Poison, Homing etc.)

collectibles.title: Orphan Socks
collectibles.pickup: Speed up + your feet feel stronger
effects: +2 Soul Hearts
Allows you to walk on harmful floor effects without taking damage (e.g. spikes, creep)

collectibles.title: Eye of the Occult
collectibles.pickup: DMG up + range up + controlled tears
effects: Tears can be controlled mid-flight using the directional keys
+1 Damage Up
+21 Range Up
-0.16 Shot Speed Down

collectibles.title: Immaculate Heart
effects: In addition to regular tears, Isaac will fire extra tears that orbit around him
+1 HP up
+20% damage multiplier (x1.2)

collectibles.title: Monstrance
effects: Isaac now emits a light aura that damages nearby enemies
The visual effect is similar to the effect given to tears by the GodHead item
The aura deals more damage towards the center

collectibles.title: The Intruder
effects: In addition to normal tears, Isaac now also fires a set of 4 quadshot tears with a slowing effect
The quadshot tears deal 1.5 damage each and do not scale with your damage upgrades.
Upon taking damage, you have a chance to dislodge the spider from your face. It leaps at enemies, dealing contact damage and firing quad shots at them.
tags: ew gross face spider in face

collectibles.title: Dirty Mind
effects: Each time you destroy part of a poop, this item will spawn 0-3 friendly Dip familiars that follow you and attack nearby enemies
Different poop types will spawn different types of Dip, each with their own effect
Golden poop dips can petrify enemies, turning them to gold for a few seconds. If the enemy dies while in this state they will drop 1-4 coins.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Challenge #36 Scat Man.

collectibles.title: Damocles
collectibles.pickup: A king's fortune... but at what cost?
effects: When used, places a sword directly above Isaac's head and while active will spawn an extra item for every item pedestal spawned.
After being hit for the first time with the sword active, the sword now has a 1 in 1000 chance every 4 frames to fall and instantly kill you.
Taking more hits will make the sword more likely to fall down.
Items with a price (i.e. in shops or devil rooms) will spawn the extra item free of charge.
If the sword falls while you have an extra life, you will respawn as normal but the extra items will no longer spawn
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Free Lemonade
effects: Upon use, spawns a large puddle of lemonade that damages any enemies which come in contact with it
Effectively the same effect as the Lemon Party pill

collectibles.title: Spirit Sword
effects: Your tears are replaced with a sword which can be swung to deal damage.
Holding any fire button charges a spin attack.
While at full red health you also shoot a projectile across the room with each swing (similar to the Master Sword in Zelda).
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #39 (Isaac's Awakening).

collectibles.title: Red Key
effects: Upon use, this item will spawn an extra red room on the map nearby.
A red outline of a door will be visible on the wall showing where the room will spawn
This room can be of many types, including but not limited to any regular room from that floor, treasure rooms, curse rooms or devil rooms.

collectibles.title: Psy Fly
effects: Gives Isaac an orbital fly, that will punch incoming tears back at the enemy, then deal contact damage to it briefly

collectibles.title: Wavy Cap
collectibles.pickup: Tears up. A mind changing experience!
effects: Upon use, increases tear rate for the current room (Tears up)
Also when used, this item will reduce your movement speed and distort the screen and sound slightly
All of these effects stack while in the same room, meaning if used too many times the screen will be distorted so much it becomes unplayable.
This item was called Black Mushroom in Antibirth.

collectibles.title: Rocket in a Jar
effects: +5 Bombs
Your bombs now become rocket powered and will fly in the direction Isaac is facing

collectibles.title: Book of Virtues
effects: Upon use, spawns a flame familiar that fires spectral tears and deals contact damage to enemies. After taking two hits, the fire will be extinguished
A maximum of 16 fires can be active at one time around Isaac
Bethany starts with this item
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Isaac as Bethany.

collectibles.title: Alabaster Box
effects: A single use active item that will spawn random amounts of consumables and angel room items when used
Starts fully uncharged and gains charges through soul, black and immortal hearts. (6 full hearts to fully charge)
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb as Bethany.

collectibles.title: The Stairway
effects: Spawns a ladder in the starting room of the next floor, which leads to an Angel Room
In Antibirth this was called Jacob's Ladder, which had to be renamed as Afterbirth+ already had an item with this name.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Isaac as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Sol
effects: After defeating the boss fight, this item will activate a use of the Sun card (full heal and map reveal) while also fully recharging your active item and removing curses from the current floor.
Permanently shows the location of the boss room on the map
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Luna
effects: Adds one extra secret room and one extra super secret room to each floor
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Mercurius
effects: Speed Up
Doors remain open when entering a room with enemies in it. This means you can leave rooms before defeating all the enemies inside.
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Venus
effects: This item causes nearby enemies to be affected by the charm effect, causing them to attack other nearby enemies
The charm effect will wear off very quicky when enemies move away from Isaac
+1 HP up
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Terra
effects: This item causes your tears to become rocks, which can break other rocks and objects
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Mars
effects: Allows Isaac to charge by double tapping the same direction, dealing damage to any enemies caught
You are invincible while charging
Can be used multiple times per room
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Jupiter
effects: -0.3 Speed Down
Isaac randomly farts around the room, spawning poison gas clouds around him.
Poison deals damage equal to half your tears.
The exact conditions for what causes Isaac to fart are currently unknown.

collectibles.title: Saturnus
effects: Gives you an aura which grants 7 orbital tears upon entering a new room
Has a chance to absorb any enemy tears
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Uranus
effects: Isaac now shoots ice tears, which will freeze killed enemies
Touching a frozen enemy will shatter it, firing ice shards in a circle around it
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Neptunus
effects: Isaac will now automatically charge up tears, allowing you to store them up and fire them rapidly for a short time
Any time you aren't firing tears, the charge bar will start filling up, for up to 3 seconds. Holding down the fire button again will quickly release all stored teared.

collectibles.title: Pluto
effects: Tears Up
Range Down
Greatly reduce Isaac's size, to an extent where some enemy tears will now travel straight over him without dealing damage
Only available inside a Planetarium

collectibles.title: Voodoo Head
effects: This item has a chance to spawn additional curse rooms on each future floor

collectibles.title: Eye Drops
effects: Tears Up
Each of Isaac's eyes now fires at differing rates, giving an overall increase to rate of fire

collectibles.title: Act of Contrition
effects: +1 Eternal Heart
+0.7 Tears Up
Allows Angel Rooms even if a Devil deal has been taken before.

collectibles.title: Member Card
effects: All shops now contain a trapdoor with a ladder, which leads down to a special shop
The special shop contains various consumables and items which are not necessarily from the normal Shop item pool
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by spending 40 coins in the same shop.

collectibles.title: Battery Pack
effects: When picked up, this item fully recharges your currently held active item and drops between 2-4 battery pickups

collectibles.title: Mom's Bracelet
effects: Upon use, Mom's Bracelet allows you to grab objects in the room and throw them, damaging any enemies which are hit
Objects include pots, rocks etc.

collectibles.title: The Scooper
effects: When used, this item spawns a Peeper familiar for the current room, which deals 12 contact damage per tick to enemies and leaves red creep in its path

collectibles.title: Ocular Rift
effects: Fired tears now have a chance to summon a rift when they land on the ground
The spawned rift sucks in enemies, projectiles and pickups and deals damage to enemies caught inside
In Antibirth this item was called Oculus Rift.

collectibles.title: Boiled Baby
effects: A familiar boil that randomly fires bursts of tears, similar to the Boil enemy

collectibles.title: Freezer Baby
effects: A familiar baby that fires tears which freeze enemies
Frozen enemies will shatter and fire ice shards when touched
Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.

collectibles.title: Eternal D6
effects: Upon use this item acts identical to the D6 item, however the item also has a small chance to disappear
In the game files this item is called 'Florians Dice', which is a reference to the Eternal update for the original Binding of Isaac game, which changed the D6 to act as this item does
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as ???.

collectibles.title: Bird Cage
effects: Taking damage for the first time in a room spawns a familiar which targets an enemy and jumps on them, releasing a rock wave outwards
For the remainder of the room the familiar then continues to attack enemies similar to the Dead Bird item
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Eve.

collectibles.title: Larynx
effects: When used, this item does a shout-type attack, with its effect increasing in damage and size the more charges you have

Larynx can be used with any number of charges. At 1 charge it deals 48 damage to any enemies close to Isaac. At the full 12 charges Isaac does a massive shout, dealing 356 damage to all enemies on the screen.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: Lost Soul
effects: This item gives you a familiar version of The Lost character which dies instantly upon hit
If the familiar survives an entire floor you get a random reward
Regenerates at the start of each floor if dead
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as The Lost.

collectibles.title: Blood Bombs
effects: +1 HP up
Restores 4 empty heart containers
Bombs now spawn a puddle of red creep upon explosion
While at 0 bombs, you can also place further bombs now at the cost of 1/2 of a heart

collectibles.title: Lil Dumpy
effects: A familiar that floats around and farts when touched by an enemy, which causes enemies to be pushed back

collectibles.title: Bird's Eye
effects: Each tear now has a chance to be a fire instead, which deals damage to enemies that come in contact with it

collectibles.title: Lodestone
effects: Tears now have a chance to cause enemies to be magnetized
Magnetized enemies attract other enemies, tears (including Isaac's) and enemy projectiles

collectibles.title: Rotten Tomato
effects: Tears now have a chance to 'mark' enemies
Marked enemies will be attacked by other enemies

collectibles.title: Birthright
effects: This item has a different effect for each character
Isaac - Doubles item pedestal spawns similar to the There's Options item
Maggy - +3 Health Up
Cain - Gives a golden key on each floor
The Lost - HP upgrades are removed from the item pool
??? - Every HP upgrade is now worth 2 soul hearts
Judas - Using a book now deals damage to all enemies in the room as well as triggering its normal effect
Eden - Gives the effect of a random item
Eve - Getting hit has a chance to spawn a dead bird that persists between rooms
Bethany - Using spirit hearts to charge your active item will sometimes not use any hearts
Jacob & Esau - When picked up, whichever character picks it up gains the current passive effects of the other
Samson, Azazel and Lazarus - No special effect yet, it simply copies another random item's effect
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating ??? as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Red Stew
effects: Fully heals all red heart containers
Significantly increases damage, however the damage boost wears off over time
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Satan as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Genesis
effects: When used, teleports you to Isaac's Bedroom, which contains a bed, a trapdoor to the next floor and a random selection of chests/items/pickups.
The bed can be used to full heal Isaac's red health.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

collectibles.title: Sharp Key
effects: +5 Keys
Upon use, allows you to consume 1 key and fire it at an enemy, dealing significant damage.
The damage done by the key projectile pierces through enemies and scales with your damage upgrades.
Keys fired by this item can open doors, secret rooms and destroy objects in the room, such as rocks.
Cannot be used if you don't have any keys.

collectibles.title: Booster Pack
effects: Spawns 5 random tarot cards

collectibles.title: Mega Mush
effects: When used, this item causes Isaac to become humongous for a short duration
While huge, Isaac is invincible and can crush objects, doors and enemies.
Gives a large damage and range stat increase but greatly reduces fire rate while active
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as with every character on Hard Mode.

collectibles.title: Knife Piece 1
effects: Combine with Knife Piece 2 to create a Knife which can be fired across the room, dealing 25 damage to any enemies it comes into contact with.

In the Downpour/Dross II, you will find a white flame somewhere, and a room with a mirror in it. Touching the white flame temporarily turns you into The Lost, but allows you to walk through the mirror into a mirrored version of this floor. You have the Holy Mantle effect to prevent one hit per room, but taking another hit will kill you. The Knife Piece 1 is located in the Item Room in the mirrored area. Returning back through the mirror door returns you back to normal again.
The mirrored floor rooms have respawned enemies, and allows you to optionally fight the Boss a second time for an extra item.
When combined with Knife Piece 2, can be used to stab the fleshy door in the Mausoleum II, which then leads to the Corpse floor and the Mother boss.

collectibles.title: Knife Piece 2
effects: Combine with Knife Piece 1 to create a Knife which can be fired across the room, dealing 25 damage to any enemies it comes into contact with.

In the Mines/Ashpit II, there's a room with a minecart and a broken track. Pressing 3 yellow buttons on the floor causes the minecart to be rideable. Following the path takes you to an abandoned mineshaft, which leads you to a pedestal with the Knife Piece. Taking it will cause Mom's Shadow to spawn and chase you. You must make it back through the path solving a few bomb puzzles while avoiding her, to get back to the regular floor. All your items and consumables are temporarily removed while in the abandoned mine.
The room to access Knife Piece 2 only appears if you have Knife Piece 1 already.
You can skip pressing the 3 yellow buttons if you have the ability to fly and have 2 bombs to force open the door.
When combined with Knife Piece 1, can be used to stab the fleshy door in the Mausoleum II, which then leads to the Corpse floor and the Mother boss.

collectibles.title: Death Certificate
effects: This is a one time use item that teleports you to an alternate floor, which contains every single item in the game.
The items are spread between several different rooms all on pedestals. You may take only one of the items, before being teleported back to where you were.
You may take only one of the items, before being teleported back to where you were.
It's literally every item, that includes items not in item pools life Knife Pieces.

collectibles.title: Bot Fly
effects: Gives you a robot fly familar that fires shielded tears at incoming projectiles

collectibles.title: Meat Cleaver
effects: When used, the Meat Cleaver will split all enemies in the room into 2 smaller versions with lower health
If the split enemy has low enough health, it will just die instead of splitting
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Isaac.

collectibles.title: Evil Charm
effects: +3 Luck Up

collectibles.title: Dogma
effects: +0.1 Speed Up.
+2.0 Damage Up.
Grants you the ability to fly.

collectibles.title: Purgatory
effects: While in a room with enemies, red cracks will appear on the floor in random locations.
Walking over the crack spawns a white soul familiar, that launches itself into the nearest enemy, exploding and dealing double your tear damage to everything near it.
Cracks will keep appearing but only one can exist in the room at a time.

collectibles.title: Stitches
effects: While held, this item spawns a familiar that can be moved around using the arrow keys and deals 1.5 damage per tick to any enemies it touches.
When activated, you teleport, swapping places with wherever Stitches was positioned.
If used while stitches is on top of an enemy, it an be used to telefrag enemies, dealing a lot of damage

collectibles.title: R Key
effects: When used, this item restarts the game and places you back on the first floor with all your currently collected items
The game timer does not reset
Allows angel rooms to be found in the new run if a devil deal was taken in the first run

collectibles.title: Knockout Drops
effects: Isaac now has a chance to fire a fist instead of normal tears

collectibles.title: Eraser
effects: A one time use active item that allows you to throw an eraser at any enemy, which will prevent it from appearing for the rest of the run
The first use will raise it above your head, then by pressing the fire button it will be thrown in that direction

collectibles.title: Yuck Heart
effects: When used, this item will give you +1 Rotten Heart
Rotten Hearts act as red hearts and spawn a blue fly upon successfully clearing a room if you are in posession of one
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Maggy.

collectibles.title: Urn of Souls
effects: Enemies now create a soul upon death, which is automatically sucked into the Urn giving it +1 charge. Mini-bosses and bosses create 2-3 souls.
When activated, the urn can be fired as a high damage flamethrower in any direction.
A charge is consumed roughly every 0.5 seconds of use.
Multi-part enemies such as Envy or Teratoma create a soul per each part killed.
A maximum of 20 souls can be held in the urn at one time.

collectibles.title: Akeldama
effects: With each shot fired, another bloody tear will spawn behind Isaac.
Spawning multiple tears will form a trail of tears that follow Isaac as he moves, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies
The effect from this item will only work while in a hostile room that contains at least 1 enemy
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Judas.

collectibles.title: Magic Skin
effects: Upon use, this item consumes 1 heart container or 2 soul hearts and spawns one item pedestal from the current room's pool
The removed health container turns into a broken heart, meaning that slot is permanently broken and the maximum health limit is reduced by 1 for the rest of the run
After 12 uses, Isaac dies instantly (this also applies to The Lost despite having no health)
Magic Skin will continue to appear after finding it once if you are not still holding it - the chance for it to replace an item is 1  (12 - number of times used) up to a maximum of 50%
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Jacob & Esau.

collectibles.title: Revelation
effects: +2 Immortal hearts
Give you spectral tears, homing tears and the ability to fly
Range Down
+0.38 Shot Speed up
Gives the Brain Worm trinket effect, which causes missed tears to redirect themselves and travel sideways towards enemies
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Bethany (due to a bug this is currently not unlockable).

collectibles.title: Consolation Prize
effects: When picked up, this item raises your lowest stat or gives you some of whichever consumable item is the lowest (+3 coins or +1 bomb or +1 key).

collectibles.title: Tinytoma
effects: Grants a large orbital that rotates around Isaac.
When the orbital takes a few hits, they split into two smaller ones.
After the smaller orbitals take another hit, they explode into 2 blue spiders.
This item will respawn after a period of time.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Lazarus.

collectibles.title: Brimstone Bombs
effects: +5 Bombs.
Your bombs now explode and fire 4 Brimstone lasers in all cardinal directions.
Each brimstone laser deals 8 damage per tick for 13 total hits.
collectibles.itemPool: Devil Room, Bomb Beggar, Greed Mode Devil Room

collectibles.title: 4.5 Volt
collectibles.pickup: Beat the juice out of them!
effects: Active items no longer charge up as normal from clearing rooms.
Enemies taking damage now charges your item instead. This includes damage you deal, and environmental damage they take e.g. from Fireplaces

collectibles.title: Fruity Plum
effects: Gives you a familiar which is a smaller version of the Plum boss, which sprays tears and propels itself around the room.
Deals contact damage to any enemies it runs into.

collectibles.title: Plum Flute
effects: When used, this item calls a friendly version of the Plum boss to fight for you for 10 seconds.
It will jump to the nearest enemy, slam on the ground and fire tears around it, then propel itself around the room, dealing contact damage to any enemies it touches before disappearing.

collectibles.title: Star of Bethlehem
effects: Spawns a star with a white aura around it, that floats very slowly through each room, making its way towards the boss.
While standing inside the aura, you gain a big Tears Up and Damage Up.
The star continues to make its way through the floor, even if you aren't in the same room as it.

collectibles.title: Cube Baby
effects: Gives you a baby in an ice cube, which can be kicked around the room by walking into it.
Enemies take damage from Cube Baby depending on how fast it was travelling when it hit them. Having a higher movement speed allows you to kick it harder.

Enemies hit by the cube while moving have a high chance to become frozen. Frozen enemies never unfreeze and are considered dead by the game. Kicking a frozen enemy will push it into the wall, where it shatters and fires ice shards everywhere (these can then freeze other enemies)
Enemies touching the cube while it's not moving or moving slowly will become slowed for a few seconds, and take a small amount of damage.
Cube Baby and enemies frozen will block enemy shots.

collectibles.title: Vade Retro
effects: Enemies that die now spawn a red ghost, that floats in place of where the enemy died.
Activating the item causes all red ghosts in the room to explode, dealing damage to any enemies near them.
The explosion doesn't deal damage to Isaac.
The red ghosts can be moved around slightly by firing tears through them.

collectibles.title: False PHD
effects: +1 Black Heart
Any 'Stat down' pills you take give you a permanent +0.6 Damage Up.
Identified all pills on pickup, and converts them to their worse counterparts (e.g. Stat Up becomes Stat Down)
Pills have a high chance to spawn a black heart when used.

collectibles.title: Spin to Win
effects: While held, gives you an orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage equal to 3.5 per tick.
When activated, the orbital will spin way faster and deal 11.3 damage per tick. Isaac will also gain +0.5 Speed Up while active.

collectibles.title: Vasculitis
effects: On death enemies now fire tears in random directions, which can damage other enemies but also Isaac
Amount of tears generated appears to scale with enemy health.

collectibles.title: Giant Cell
effects: Every time you take damage, a tiny Isaac familiar will spawn, which follows you and shoots tears at nearby enemies that deal 1.3 Damage.
The mini-Isaacs stay with you between floors, but can die if they take too much damage
Maximum number of mini-Isaacs is 16 at one time.
Mini-Isaac's keep some of the abilities and appearance that Isaac has - e.g. the ability to fly.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: Tropicamide
effects: +5.25 Range Up
Tear Size Up

collectibles.title: Card Reading
effects: At the beginning of all future floors, two portals will appear, that can take you to either the Boss room (Red portal), Item room (Yellow portal) or Secret room (Blue portal).

collectibles.title: Quints
effects: Every time an enemy dies, a random familiar spawns where it was killed for the rest of the room.
The familiar cannot move, but continues to do its usual abilities.
Some of the possible familiars include: Brother Bobby, Sister Maggy, Little Steven, Demon Baby, Multidimensional Baby, Freezing Baby, Rotten Baby, Harlequin Baby and many more.
collectibles.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

collectibles.title: Tooth and Nail
effects: Every 5 seconds you become spiky for a brief moment, and deal contact damage to enemies.
While in this state you have invincibility to damage.

collectibles.title: Binge Eater
effects: Causes all pedestal items to show up as rotating items, that swap between the spawned item and a HP up item every second. This allows you to choose between the item that originally spawned and a HP upgrade every time.
When you pick up an item that increases your maximum HP, you gain a temporary damage boost that slowly goes down over time. Starts at +3.6 damage and goes to 0 after 30 seconds.
This effect applies to all items, including those in the shop and devil room.

collectibles.title: Guppy's Eye
effects: Shows you to see the contents of chests, and items that will drop from fires and poops before you destroy them.
Counts as 1 of 3 cat items needed towards the Guppy transformation.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Mother in the Corpse II as Cain.

collectibles.title: Strawman
effects: Spawns a Keeper familiar, that shoots triple tears and follows your exact movements as you walk.
The keeper has 3 health coins and can die if it takes enough damage. He can pick up coins to restore health.
Similar to other familiars of this kind, you can hold the drop key to cause him to stand still.
If he dies, his corpse turns into a few blue spiders. He won't respawn even if you move to a new floor.

collectibles.title: Dad's Note
effects: Only found in the Mausoleum II boss room.
The item itself has no effect.

collectibles.title: Sausage
effects: +1 HP.
+0.2 Speed Up.
+0.5 Tears Up.
+0.5 Damage Up.
+1.5 Range Up.
+0.16 Shot Speed Up
+1 Luck Up.

collectibles.title: Options?
effects: Clearing a room will spawn an extra reward, however only one can be picked up - the other one will disappear.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the The Beast as Isaac.

collectibles.title: Candy Heart
effects: Every red heart you pick up gives a small but permanent stat increase.
Randomly picks between +0.05 Tears Up, +0.15 or +0.3 Range Up, +0.02 or +0.04 Speed Up, +0.1 Luck Up, +0.04 Shot Speed Up.

collectibles.title: A Pound of Flesh
effects: This item causes Devil deals to cost money instead of hearts, and shop items to cost hearts instead of money.
Shop items cost heart containers, and pickups have spikes around them.
The Devil deal conversion rate is 1 heart container to 15 coins.
Devil deal items can be on discount similar to the shop, making it 1 heart container = 7 coins instead.

collectibles.title: Redemption
effects: Every time you enter a devil room and choose not to take an item, you get +1 Damage Up upon entering the next floor.
The effect is shown via a cross above Isaac's head. Taking a Devil deal breaks the cross and prevents the damage up next floor.
Taking free pickups such as Black hearts in the Devil room also count.
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Beast as Judas.

collectibles.title: Spirit Shackles
collectibles.unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Beast as The Forgotten.

collectibles.title: Cracked Orb
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Empty Heart
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Astral Projection
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: C Section
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Lil Abaddon
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Montezuma's Revenge
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Lil Portal
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Worm Friend
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Bone Spurs
effects: Enemies that die will leave behind 1-2 floating bone shards where they die, until you leave the room.
Other enemies that touch the bone shards will take 3.5 damage, with a chance to either bounce off them or cause it to break and disappear.

collectibles.title: Hungry Soul
effects: Each time an enemy dies, a friendly red soul appears. It will hunt down other enemies, dealing contact damage which scales with your tear damage.
After 5 seconds the red soul explodes (Isaac doesn't take damage from this effect).

collectibles.title: Jar of Wisps
effects: When used, gives you number of blue flame orbitals based on the number shown over this item.
It starts at 1, and increments each activation, giving you more familiars each time you use it.
The flames fire tears at the same time Isaac does, that deal a flat 3 damage.
If a flame touches an enemy, it deals contact damage equal to double your current tear damage and then disappears.
You can have a maximum of 24 flame orbitals at once.
Each flame has a chance to spawn as one of many variants, such as green flames that poison enemies, or a crucifix flame that spawns a random horseman familiar + Locusts when it is extinguished.

collectibles.title: Soul Locket
effects: +1 Soul Heart
Other effects of this item are unknown.

collectibles.title: Friend Finder
effects: Spawns a random charmed enemy which fights by your side and copies your exact movements, similar to how Jacob & Esau work.
The familiars fire tears at the same time as Isaac, and have a visible health bar showing how much damage they can take before dying.

collectibles.title: Inner Child
effects: Gives you an extra life
You respawn as a tiny version of Isaac, with a greatly reduced hitbox.

collectibles.title: Glitched Crown
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Belly Jelly
effects: Enemies that touch Isaac will now bounce off him and fly off in the opposite direction.
Touching enemies still causes contact damage, however bounced enemies will die if they slam into the wall.
This item also gives a random chance for enemy shots to bounce off you without taking damage.

collectibles.title: Sacred Orb
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Sanguine Bond
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: The Swarm
effects: When picked up, this gives you 9 orbital flies.
Each time a fly blocks an enemy shot, it will turn into a blue fly and attack nearby enemies, leaving you with one less orbital.
Every room clear gives you +1 orbital fly, up to a maximum of 9.

collectibles.title: Heartbreak
effects: +0.75 Damage Up, and adds 3 'broken' heart containers.
The 'broken' heart containers mean the maximum health limit is reduced by 3 for the rest of the run, leaving you with a max total of 9 instead of the usual 12.

collectibles.title: Bloody Gust
effects: Every time you take damage, you gain a Speed Up and a Tears Up.
The stat increases start small, and scale up each time you take damage (+0.25 Tears Up for the first hit, +0.75 Tears Up for the 6th hit).
The effect maxes out at +3 Tears Up and +1 Speed Up after taking damage 6 times. This brings you to the maximum possible speed.
The effect lasts for the rest of the current floor.

collectibles.title: Salvation
effects: Isaac gains a halo of light around him. When an enemy touches the halo for couple of seconds, a beam of light will come down and deal a burst of damage to it.
The triggered beam also fires in all 4 cardinal directions, dealing damage to anything it touches.
Every time an enemy is killed with this effect, the halo grows slightly bigger.

collectibles.title: Vanishing Twin
effects: A fetus familiar follows Isaac, and upon entering the Boss room on each floor, it will transform into a copy of the boss.
This makes bosses a lot harder, however you now get 2 boss item drops.

collectibles.title: Twisted Pair
effects: You gain two familiar demons, that stay by Isaac's side and fire shots in the same direction as you.
The familiars deal roughly 40% of Isaac's damage, scaling with damage upgrades you get.
They sit near and rotate around Isaac depending on which way you're firing tears. They do not block enemy shots.

collectibles.title: Azazel's Rage
effects: Isaac builds rage each time you clear a new room. This is shown by the Azazel skin spreading on Isaac's face.
After 4 rooms, Isaac's face will flash red. The next room you enter he will automatically fire a massive red brimstone laser for 4 seconds, dealing huge damage.
The rage resets back to zero, and the cycle continues every 5 rooms cleared.

collectibles.title: Echo Chamber
collectibles.pickup: I can see see the future future future
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Isaac's Tomb
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Vengeful Spirit
effects: Each time you take damage, a red flame orbital will appear around Isaac for the remainder of the floor, up to a maximum of 6.
The flames deal contact damage which scales with your tear damage.
Upon reaching 6 flames, they will also start to fire tears along with Isaac, dealing a flat 3.2 damage per tear.
When entering a new floor, all the flames disappear.

collectibles.title: Esau Jr.
effects: Using this item swaps you between the character you started as, and Esau, which has 3 black hearts, +2 base damage and the ability to fly.
This character keeps its own separate health and items. Items picked up are not shared between the two characters.
If either character dies it's game over.

collectibles.title: Berserk!
effects: When activated, Isaac gets a bone sword and goes on a killing rampage, gaining +0.4 Speed, +3 Flat Damage Up.
The sword deals x4 damage if used at close range, or x2 damage if charged up and thrown.
Clearing rooms doesn't charge this item - charge is added equal to damage taken by enemies. This includes all sources of damage, including environmental damage to enemies.
The bone sword from this item is similar to Donkey Jawbone from Antibirth.

collectibles.title: Dark Arts
effects: When used, Isaac turns into a ghost for 1 second and his speed goes up to maximum (2.0). During this time he can walk over enemies to mark them for death. When the effect wears off, Isaac quickly runs between each marked enemy, dealing high damage to each one rapidly (roughly x2.5 your tear damage).

collectibles.title: Abyss
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Supper
effects: +1 HP Up

collectibles.title: Stapler
effects: +1.0 Damage Up
Staples one of Isaac's eyes shut, meaning he only shoots tears from one eye. This means some effects such as R U A WIZARD pills only fire tears in one direction.

collectibles.title: Suplex!
effects: When used, you charge forwards for a second. If you touch an enemy in that time, Isaac will pick it up and slam it on the ground, killing it and sending a shockwave around the impact.
In the brief period while holding the enemy you can move a target to decide where it lands.
Actually does work on bosses! However after the attack you end up near the boss, which puts you in danger of taking damage too.

collectibles.title: Bag of Crafting
effects: Can be used to store up to 8 consumables in, such as hearts, coins, keys, bombs, cards etc.
When the bag has 8 items you can hold down the activate button for 2 seconds to craft yourself a brand new item
Each combination of pickups you hold in the bag will create a specific item. Check out the Mechanics > Bag of Crafting page to see combinations (Coming soon!)
Has other uses - Will deal 3 damage to enemies it hits, and can be used to quickly push bombs and objects across rooms.

collectibles.title: Flip
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Lemegeton
effects: When used, gives you an orbital flame which represents another passive item in the game. While you have this flame you also have that item's effect.
The flame deals double your tear damage to any enemies that touch it, but if it takes too much damage the flame will disappear and you lose the item's effect.

collectibles.title: Sumptorium
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Recall
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Hold
effects: Item effect coming soon :)

collectibles.title: Keeper's Sack
effects: Spawns 3 random coins and a key when picked up
Buying items from the shop gives you random stat upgrades. The more you spend the higher the stat increase.
Possible stats include Speed, Damage and Range.
15c items give all 3 stats: +1 Damage Up, +0.03 or +0.06 Speed Up, +0.25 or +0.5 Range Up.
5c items give 1 or 2 stats: +0.5 Damage Up **OR** +0.25 Range and +0.03 Speed Up.

collectibles.title: Keeper's Kin
effects: Rocks and pots spawn 2 blue spiders when they are broken

collectibles.title: Keeper's Box
effects: When used, spawns a random shop item or consumable, however you have to pay the relevant cost to pick it up.
Can include anything that would appear in the shop.

collectibles.title: Everything Jar
effects: With every bar of charge this item has, a different item is shown inside the Jar. Items start as poops/coins at low charge, moving up to   cards, pills and golden.

At the full 12 charges, a completely random effect will happen. It can be anything including spawning a bunch of consumables, spawning a glitched pedestal item, creating a bunch of light beams, spawning troll bombs or nothing at all.

collectibles.title: TMTRAINER
collectibles.pickup: Isaac and his mother lived alone in a small house on a hill
effects: When picked up, all future items become 'glitched', causing them to become random combinations of 2-3 effects based on other items.
Glitched items can be passive or active and are completely randomly generated with infinite possibilities (similar to other 'Randomizer' games).
Random effects combine effects that exist on other items, and assign them to a random event (e.g. on enemy death, on room clear, on damage taken etc.).

collectibles.title: Anima Sola
effects: When used, it puts the closes enemy in chains for 5 seconds, preventing it from moving

collectibles.title: Spindown Dice
effects: Rerolls all pedestal items into another item.
New items can be chosen from any item pool, not just the one relevant to the current room.

collectibles.title: Hypercoagulation
effects: Upon taking damage you have a chance to drop the heart that you just lost. It gives you 2 seconds to pick it up again to re-heal, before it disappears.

collectibles.title: IBS
effects: Causes Isaac to throw a random type of poop, at random intervals.
An addition chance for Explosive Diarrhea to happen, which spawns 5 troll bombs where Isaac is standing.

collectibles.title: Hemoptysis
effects: Allows you to quickly double tap a shoot button to sneeze on nearby enemies, dealing x1.5 your tear damage.

collectibles.title: Ghost Bombs
effects: +5 Bombs.
Bombs spawn a friendly white soul, which will hunt down other enemies, dealing contact damage which scales with your tear damage.
After 10 seconds the red soul explodes (Isaac doesn't take damage from this effect).

collectibles.title: Gello
effects: When used, allows you to throw a familiar, which deals x3 your tear damage to any enemies it touches.
The familiar is attached via an Umbilical Cord, but will move and shoot in the same direction Isaac is shooting.
Can be used multiple times per room to spawn more familiars, however they only last for the current room.

collectibles.title: Decap Attack
effects: When used, this item allows you to throw your head where it will sit as a stationary sentry firing bullets until you walk over and pick it up again.
Throwing Isaac's head deals 24 damage to anything it hits.
Your hitbox remains with the body. Enemies touching the head don't hurt Isaac.

trinkets.title: Swallowed Penny
effects: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll).

trinkets.title: Petrified Poop
effects: While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.

trinkets.title: AAA Battery
effects: Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1.
Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room.
For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead.

trinkets.title: Broken Remote
effects: Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item.
Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms).

trinkets.title: Purple Heart
effects: Higher chance for champion enemies while held.

trinkets.title: Broken Magnet
effects: Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance.
Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does.

trinkets.title: Rosary Bead
effects: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).

trinkets.title: Cartridge
effects: When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.
The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.

trinkets.title: Pulse Worm
effects: Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.
Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.

trinkets.title: Wiggle Worm
effects: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.
Tears up (not applied until the next time your tears stat is updated).

trinkets.title: Ring Worm
effects: While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.
Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.

trinkets.title: Flat Worm
effects: Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox.
Higher knockback effect with your tears.

trinkets.title: Store Credit
effects: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Lazarus.

trinkets.title: Callus
effects: Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held.

trinkets.title: Lucky Rock
effects: Rocks now drop money when broken.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 rocks.

trinkets.title: Mom's Toenail
effects: Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent.
Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!

trinkets.title: Black Lipstick
effects: Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eve.

trinkets.title: Bible Tract
effects: Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.
Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.

trinkets.title: Paper Clip
effects: Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.
Does not work on locked rooms.

trinkets.title: Monkey's Paw
effects: When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.
After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.

trinkets.title: Mysterious Paper
effects: Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.
A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.

Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden.

trinkets.title: Daemon's Tail
effects: When Daemon's Tail is held, most future Heart drop will be rerolled into something else, with a certain chance to be rerolled into a Black Heart.
Every type of heart will be affected (except for hearts spawned in Super Secret Rooms) and causes Mitre, Bible Tract, Mom's Pearl to become useless.
Upon entering a new room that already has hearts on the ground, they will all be converted into Black Hearts.

Hearts that spawn after clearing a room, opening a chest or playing a slot machine/beggar will be re-rolled into another possible pickup that could appear. This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of  all other pickups
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Azazel.

trinkets.title: Missing Poster
effects: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Dark Room with Isaac.

trinkets.title: Butt Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart.

trinkets.title: Mysterious Candy
effects: Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.

trinkets.title: Hook Worm
effects: Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room.
Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal.

trinkets.title: Whip Worm
effects: +0.5 Shot Speed Up.
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.

trinkets.title: Broken Ankh
effects: Has a 22.22% chance to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lazarus.

trinkets.title: Fish Head
effects: Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn.

trinkets.title: Pinky Eye
effects: Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.
The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.
The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.

trinkets.title: Push Pin
effects: Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.
The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.

trinkets.title: Liberty Cap
effects: While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room
Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass.

trinkets.title: Umbilical Cord
effects: If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.

trinkets.title: Child's Heart
trinkets.pickup: It calls out to its brothers
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests.

trinkets.title: Curved Horn
effects: +2 Damage Up
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Judas.

trinkets.title: Rusted Key
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.

trinkets.title: Goat Hoof
effects: +0.15 Speed Up.

trinkets.title: Mom's Pearl
effects: Grants a secondary chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a soul heart.

trinkets.title: Cancer
effects: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is.
Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum.

trinkets.title: Red Patch
effects: You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.

trinkets.title: Match Stick
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs.
Picking up the Match Stick is the only way to remove the Tick trinket.

trinkets.title: Lucky Toe
effects: +1 Luck Up while held.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room).

trinkets.title: Cursed Skull
effects: When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.

trinkets.title: Safety Cap
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.

trinkets.title: Ace of Spades
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.

trinkets.title: Isaac's Fork
effects: After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart.

trinkets.title: A Missing Page
effects: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time.

trinkets.title: Bloody Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Samson.

trinkets.title: Burnt Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #13 (Beans!).

trinkets.title: Flat Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a key.

trinkets.title: Counterfeit Penny
effects: When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times.

trinkets.title: Tick
effects: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.

This trinket can only be removed by using the Smelter item (Afterbirth+ DLC only) or picking up the Match Stick trinket, meaning you are otherwise unable to take any more trinkets unless you get another item which allows you to hold a second  trinket (e.g. Mom's Purse).

trinkets.title: Isaac's Head
effects: While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Isaac.

trinkets.title: Maggy's Faith
effects: At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Maggy.

trinkets.title: Judas' Tongue
effects: Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Judas.

trinkets.title: ???'s Soul
effects: Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Blue Baby.

trinkets.title: Samson's Lock
effects: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson.

trinkets.title: Cain's Eye
effects: Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass).
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Cain.

trinkets.title: Eve's Bird Foot
effects: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar.
The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eve.

trinkets.title: The Left Hand
trinkets.pickup: The left hand path reaps dark rewards
effects: Replaces chest spawns with red chests.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Ultra Pride.

trinkets.title: Shiny Rock
effects: While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds.

trinkets.title: Safety Scissors
effects: Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use.
Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups.

trinkets.title: Rainbow Worm
effects: Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds.
The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm

trinkets.title: Tape Worm
effects: While held, Tape Worm doubles your range stat and halves your tear height stat.

trinkets.title: Lazy Worm
effects: -0.4 Shot Speed Down.
+4.0 Range Up.
+2.0 Tear Height.

trinkets.title: Cracked Dice
effects: Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with ???.

trinkets.title: Super Magnet
effects: While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you.
Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities.

trinkets.title: Faded Polaroid
