effects: Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them.

trinkets.title: Louse
effects: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies.

trinkets.title: Bob's Bladder
effects: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it.

trinkets.title: Watch Battery
effects: Gives you an increased chance of finding battery consumables.
Has a chance to add an extra charge to your active item upon completing a room.

trinkets.title: Blasting Cap
effects: Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up.

trinkets.title: Stud Finder
effects: Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #27 (Brains).

trinkets.title: Error
effects: Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game.
Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.

trinkets.title: Poker Chip
effects: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #26 (I Rule).

trinkets.title: Blister
effects: Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held

trinkets.title: Second Hand
effects: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.

trinkets.title: Endless Nameless
effects: While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you.

trinkets.title: Black Feather
effects: +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have.
Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eve.

trinkets.title: Blind Rage
effects: Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)
This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Samson.

trinkets.title: Golden Horse Shoe
effects: +15% chance to get a double item room to spawn on the next floor.
If the effect activates, two items spawn in your item room, however only one can be taken (Same effect as the More Options item)
The chance doubles to +30% with the effect from Mom's Box.

trinkets.title: Store Key
effects: Automatically opens all shop room doors for free.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by donating 666 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.UNLOCK: Keeper starts with this trinket after beating Satan with Keeper.

trinkets.title: Rib of Greed
effects: Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms.
Holding Rib of Greed increase your chance to receive coin drops.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Ultra Greed with Keeper.

trinkets.title: Karma
effects: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb boss with Keeper.

trinkets.title: Lil Larva
effects: Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly

trinkets.title: Mom's Locket
effects: While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest.
Changes all half red hearts into full hearts.

trinkets.title: NO!
effects: While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items.
It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items.
Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn.
Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket.

trinkets.title: Child Leash
effects: Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other.

trinkets.title: Brown Cap
effects: Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed.

trinkets.title: Meconium
effects: While held you have an increased chance for Black Poops to spawn, which deal damage to all enemies in the room when destroyed
Gives The Poop active item a chance to spawn a Black Poop too
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with ???.

trinkets.title: Cracked Crown
effects: Gives you extra stat upgrades based on the items you've already collected that have stat increases, at +33% of the item's original increase
Also gives you a +0.2 Tears Up and -1 Tear Delay even if you don't have an item that increases your tears stat

trinkets.title: Used Diaper
effects: While held, gives the Skatole effect only in certain rooms, which will turn hostile flies to neutral and stop others from shooting.
Attack, Dart and Ring Flies turn into neutral Black Flies and Pooters and Fat Flies will no longer fire at you.

trinkets.title: Fish Tail
effects: Items and trinkets which generate blue flies and spiders will have double the effect, causing twice as many to spawn

trinkets.title: Black Tooth
effects: Some tears will randomly become a black tooth, that deal double your normal tear damage and can poison enemies

trinkets.title: Ouroboros Worm
effects: Tears become spectral and travel in a large spiral pattern
+4.0 Range Up

trinkets.title: Tonsil
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to gain a Tonsil familiar, which follows you and blocks enemy projectiles
This effect can happen twice before the Tonsil trinket is destroyed
Does not deal contact damage to enemies

The Tonsil familiar counts as a passive item but does not appear in any item pools, meaning this trinket is the only way to find it (aside from starting with it as Eden) and make it appear in your Items Collection page.

trinkets.title: Nose Goblin
effects: Your tears have a random chance to become booger tears
Booger tears stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die or 60 seconds passes. Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
The boogers will have a homing effect

trinkets.title: Super Ball
effects: Some random tears will gain the Rubber Cement effect and become bouncy

trinkets.title: Vibrant Bulb
effects: Grants +0.25 Speed, +0.75 Range, +0.1 Shot Speed, +0.2 Tears, +0.5 Damage and +1 Luck when Isaac's active item is fully charged
Infinite use items such as Potato Peeler count as charged and provide the bonus from this trinket

trinkets.title: Dim Bulb
effects: Grants +0.5 Speed, +1.5 Range, +0.3 Shot Speed, +0.4 Tears, +1.5 Damage when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged
One-time use items such as Mama Mega count as uncharged and provide the bonus from this trinket.

trinkets.title: Fragmented Card
effects: Gives you another secret room on each new floor while held
Does not spawn more than one super secret room, only the normal secret room

trinkets.title: Equality!
effects: When you have the same amount of coins, bombs and keys, half consumables turn into their doubled version
This effect works for any number of consumables, including 0 and 99, as long as the count for coins/keys/bombs is equal

trinkets.title: Wish Bone
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn a random pedestal item
When the effect triggers, the trinket is destroyed

trinkets.title: Bag Lunch
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn the Lunch item, which gives +1 HP up
When the effect triggers, this trinket is destroyed

trinkets.title: Lost Cork
effects: Increases the radius of any creep you produce

trinkets.title: Crow Heart
effects: While held, any damage taken will ignore soul hearts and black hearts, causing your red heart containers to be depleted first
While at 1/2 of a red heart, it will begin to remove your soul hearts and black hearts on damage again.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode with Eve.

trinkets.title: Walnut
trinkets.pickup: Thats a hard nut to crack!
effects: The Walnut has a chance to break when taking damage from an explosion. If it does, it will drop a random trinket, coin, heart and key
The Walnut trinket is destroyed once the effect activates

trinkets.title: Duct Tape
effects: Causes any orbitals you have to stop moving while held
Stops shooting familiars from moving (including Lilith's Incubus)
Some familiars with irregular movement are not affected by Duct Tape, such as Abel, BBF, Bumbo, Guppy's Hair Ball, Lil Gurdy, Punching Bag, Robo-Baby 2.0, Succubus

trinkets.title: Silver Dollar
effects: While held, shops will now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Cain.

trinkets.title: Bloody Crown
effects: While held, item rooms now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Samson.

trinkets.title: Pay To Win
effects: While held, restock boxes will always spawn in item rooms

trinkets.title: Locust of War
effects: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies, dealing double tear damage for the impact of the Locust and 60 damage for the explosion
Can be dangerous as the fly will target the nearest enemy, which can be close enough to catch Isaac in its blast radius
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac in the Cathedral as Apollyon.

trinkets.title: Locust of Pestilence
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a green attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and then poison them
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Apollyon.

trinkets.title: Locust of Famine
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a yellow attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and apply a slowing effect to it
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating ??? in The Chest as Apollyon.

trinkets.title: Locust of Death
effects: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Black Locust that deals quadruple Isaac's damage, applied as two hits of double damage.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating The Lamb as Apollyon.

trinkets.title: Locust of Conquest
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn 2-5 white attack flies, which will target a nearby enemy and deal double your tear damage to it
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Boss Rush as Apollyon.

trinkets.title: Bat Wing
effects: When killing an enemy, you have a very small chance to gain the ability to fly for the rest of the room.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Azazel.

trinkets.title: Stem Cell
effects: Heals you for 1/2 a red heart after travelling down to the next floor
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Samson.

trinkets.title: Hairpin
trinkets.pickup: Poke that power outlet! Bosses charge you
effects: Fully recharges your active item at the start of each boss fight
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Zaratus

trinkets.title: Wooden Cross
effects: Gives you the Holy Mantle shield effect at the start of every new floor, which protects you from the next hit of damage you take
Does not recharge until the start of the next floor
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ep and Mills

trinkets.title: Butter!
effects: Using your active item while holding this trinket will drop it back on a pedestal on the ground
Also after taking damage, you have a very small chance to drop one of your passive items
One-time use active items will be consumed and not dropped
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by MarkusLeben and iguesti

trinkets.title: Filigree Feather
effects: Holding this trinket will cause the Angel mini bosses to drop normal items instead of Key Pieces
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2, designed by Edmund McMillen

trinkets.title: Door Stop
effects: While held, the last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it
This trinket works on boss rooms (except Ultra Greed) and devil rooms containing Krampus, allowing you to exit out mid-fight

trinkets.title: Extension Cord
effects: After being picked up, a yellow laser chain now flows through Isaac's familiars.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom

trinkets.title: Rotten Penny
effects: While held, spawns +1 friendly blue fly every time you pick up a coin.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Eufuu
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by having a lot of blue flies at once.

trinkets.title: Baby-Bender
effects: While held this trinket gives your familiars homing shots.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ink Tears
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by having two items or effects that grant homing shots at once (e.g. Spoon Bender, Telepathy for Dummies, I - The Magician).

trinkets.title: Finger Bone
effects: While held, gives you a small chance to gain a bone heart everytime you take damage.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #5
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Ultra Greed as The Forgotten.

trinkets.title: Jawbreaker
effects: Tears have a chance to become a tooth, dealing more than triple damage.

trinkets.title: Chewed Pen
effects: Tears have a chance to slow enemies.

trinkets.title: Blessed Penny
effects: Chance to spawn half a soul heart when picking up a coin.
Picking up nickels and dimes can spawn multiple half soul hearts.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating ??? as Bethany.

trinkets.title: Broken Syringe
effects: Gives you a random syringe effect every room.
The effect can be The Virus, Roid Rage, Speed Ball, Experimental Treatment, Synthoil, Euthanasia or Growth Hormones

trinkets.title: Exploded Firecracker
effects: Placed bombs explode almost instantly.

trinkets.title: Gigante Bean
effects: Farts produced by Isaac or familiars will be twice as large.

trinkets.title: A Lighter
effects: Chance for enemies to burn when entering a room
The chance for this effect to activate is effected by your Luck stat

trinkets.title: Broken Padlock
effects: Explosions can open locked doors
This includes the doors to the Antibirth floors: Downpour, Mines and Mausoleum, but not the Corpse floor

trinkets.title: Myosotis
effects: Pickups left on current floor will appear in the starting room of the next floor, up to a maximum of 8 pickups

trinkets.title: 'M
effects: Active items will be rerolled upon using them.
Breath of Life is not rerolled by this trinket.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating The Witness as Eden.

trinkets.title: Teardrop Charm
effects: Tear-based effects have an extra chance of occurring.

trinkets.title: Apple of Sodom
effects: Picking up red hearts now has a high chance to spawn 1-4 blue attack spiders, instead of giving you health back.
This effect also works while fully healed, giving a guaranteed chance of getting spiders.

trinkets.title: Forgotten Lullaby
effects: Gives your familiars improved rate of fire while held.
In Antibirth this trinket was called Song of the Siren.
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this trinket by bombing the skull left by The Siren boss after her death.

trinkets.title: Beth's Faith
effects: While held at the start of each floor, this trinket spawns four wisp familiar orbitals around Isaac
These wisps are the same as the ones created by the Book of Virtues item
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush as Bethany.

trinkets.title: Old Capacitor
effects: Your active item no longer gains charges, but battery drops become much more common
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 10 Charge Machines.

trinkets.title: Brain Worm
effects: Missed tears will redirect themselves and travel sideways towards enemies.

trinkets.title: Perfection
trinkets.pickup: Luck way up. Don't lose it!
effects: +10 Luck while held, trinket is destroyed when damage is taken
Can be dropped in order to avoid breaking it

trinkets.title: Devil's Crown
effects: Treasure Rooms are replaced with Red Treasure Rooms, which contain a deal with the devil in place of a regular item pedestal.
If an item room as not yet been entered, it can be transformed to either a regular or Red Treasure Room by picking up or dropping this trinket before entering
trinkets.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Witness as Azazel.

trinkets.title: Charged Penny
effects: Every time you pick up a coin, you have a small chance to gain 1 bar of charge on your active item.
In Antibirth this trinket was called Electric Penny.

trinkets.title: Friendship Necklace
effects: While held, your familiars will now orbit around Isaac instead of following behind him.

trinkets.title: Panic Button
effects: If your active item is fully charged, when you take damage it will automatically activate.
It doesn't activate for free - the charges are used up as normal if this effect activates.

trinkets.title: Blue Key
effects: Doors can be opened without using up a key.
However, when entering the door you are taken to a blue womb room with enemies to defeat. This room will always drop a reward at the end, then allow you to exit back to the real floor.

trinkets.title: Flat File
effects: While held this trinket causes spikes to retract into the floor.
Works for curse rooms - you no longer take damage entering or leaving.

trinkets.title: Telescope Lens
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Mom's Lock
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Dice Bag
effects: Every time you enter a brand new room, you have a chance to get a random one-time use Dice (e.g. D6, D6, D20 etc.)

trinkets.title: Holy Crown
trinkets.pickup: Walk the path of the saint
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Mother's Kiss
effects: While held you get +1 HP Up.
The first time you pick this trinket up, the heart container will be filled. This effect can't be abused - next time it will be empty if dropped.

trinkets.title: Torn Card
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Torn Pocket
effects: Every time you take damage, you drop up to 2 different types of consumables on the ground.
Dropped consumables can be any variant of its kind - e.g. a bomb can become a troll bomb, or a dropped coin can become a dime.
Does nothing if you have no consumables.

trinkets.title: Gilded Key
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Lucky Sack
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Wicked Crown
trinkets.pickup: Walk the path of the wicked
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Azazel's Stump
effects: Small chance to become Azazel and gain his short-range Brimstone laser for the current room.
Exact condition for triggering is unknown

trinkets.title: Dingle Berry
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Ring Cap
effects: Drops 2 bombs at once (only 1 bomb is removed from your total)

trinkets.title: Nuh Uh!
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Modeling Clay
effects: Each brand new room, this trinket has a chance to transform into a copy of a random passive item, which gives you the effect for the duration of this room.

trinkets.title: Polished Bone
effects: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly Bony when clearing a room, which will throw bones at enemies until it takes enough damage to die. Max 3 Bonys at once.

trinkets.title: Hollow Heart
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Kid's Drawing
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Crystal Key
effects: Sometimes creates Red Key rooms, which appear in gaps on the map
This room can be of many types, including but not limited to any regular room from that floor, treasure rooms, curse rooms or devil rooms.

trinkets.title: Keeper's Bargain
effects: Has a decent chance for Devil Deals to cost money instead of Health.
The conversion rate is 1 heart container to 15 coins.
Items can be on discount similar to the shop, making it 1 heart container = 7 coins instead.
Can be dropped to disable this effect while in the room.

trinkets.title: Cursed Penny
effects: While held, you will be teleported to a random room everytime you pick up a coin.

trinkets.title: Your Soul
effects: Allows you to pay for a devil deal with this trinket.

trinkets.title: Number Magnet
effects: +10% devil room chance while held.

trinkets.title: Strange Key
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Lil Clot
effects: A small clot friend will hug Isaac, following his exact movements (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) and shooting tears when he does.
The clot can be moved around by collision with an object/wall, allowing you to re-position it.
The clot's damage is roughly 1/3 of your tear damage.
If it takes a few hits it will die, and respawn in the next room.

trinkets.title: Temporary Tattoo
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Swallowed M80
effects: When taking damage you have a chance to explode and deal 185 damage to all enemies around you (Same damage as a Mr. Mega bomb)

trinkets.title: RC Remote
effects: Familiars follow Isaac's exact movements, (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) instead of following loosely like they usually do
Holding the drop button (Ctrl on Steam version) causes them to stop moving.
Doesn't affect some familiars with specific movement patterns, e.g. Abel

trinkets.title: Found Soul
effects: Gives you a familiar that follows Isaac's exact movements (similar to how Jacob & Esau work) and shoots spectral tears.
Similar to Jacob and Esau, positions can be altered by running it into objects, or holding the drop button (Ctrl on Steam version).
When you place a bomb, the Found Soul will drop one too.
If it takes any damage, it will die and not respawn until the next floor.

trinkets.title: Expansion Pack
effects: Everytime you use your active item, you have a chance to activate another random active item.

trinkets.title: Beth's Essence
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: The Twins
effects: Chance to spawn either Brother Bobby or Sister Maggy when entering each new room.
Only lasts for the current room.

trinkets.title: Adoption Papers
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Cricket Leg
effects: Every time an enemy dies you have a chance to gain a random Locust.
Different color Locusts correspond to the horsemen. Each of them deal double your tear damage, similar to how standard blue flies work.
War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage.
Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks.
Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect.
Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2.
Conquest (White) - Multiple will spawn at once.

trinkets.title: Apollyon's Best Friend
effects: Gives you a red attack fly, that will charge at enemies in the same direciton you are shooting.
Deals damage equal to your current tear damage.
Stops charging once it hits an enemy and returns to Isaac's side.

trinkets.title: Broken Glasses
effects: Trinket effect coming soon :)

trinkets.title: Ice Cube
effects: Gives a small chance for your tears to freeze enemies in place.
Frozen enemies can be pushed into obstacles where they shatter on contact and fire ice shards around them. Any other enemies hit by these shards will become frozen too.
Frozen enemies are considered dead by the game, and won't unfreeze or move again. The room doors will open if only frozen enemies remain.

trinkets.title: Sigil of Baphomet
effects: Every time you kill an enemy you get an invincibility shield for 2 seconds.

consumables.title: O - The Fool
effects: Teleports the player to the first room of the current floor.

consumables.title: I - The Magician
consumables.pickup: May you never miss your goal
effects: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purle appearance.

consumables.title: II - The High Priestess
effects: Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage.
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks.

consumables.title: III - The Empress
effects: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed.

consumables.title: IV - The Emperor
effects: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor.

consumables.title: V - The Hierophant
effects: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor.

consumables.title: VI - The Lovers
consumables.pickup: May you prosper and be in good health
effects: Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor.

consumables.title: VII - The Chariot
effects: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit.

consumables.title: VIII - Justice
effects: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each.

consumables.title: IX - The Hermit
consumables.pickup: May you see what life has to offer
effects: Teleports the player to the Shop.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors.

consumables.title: X - Wheel of Fortune
effects: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine.

consumables.title: XI - Strength
effects: Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room.
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room.

consumables.title: XII - The Hanged Man
effects: Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room.
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly.

consumables.title: XIII - Death
consumables.pickup: Lay waste to all that oppose you
effects: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon.

consumables.title: XIV - Temperance
consumables.pickup: May you be pure in heart
effects: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine.

consumables.title: XV - The Devil
consumables.pickup: Revel in the power of your darkness
effects: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage.

consumables.title: XVI - The Tower
effects: Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room.
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage.

consumables.title: XVII - The Stars
consumables.pickup: May you find what you desire
effects: Teleports the player to the Item Room.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors.

consumables.title: XVIII - The Moon
consumables.pickup: May you find all you have lost
effects: Teleports the player to the Secret Room.

consumables.title: XIX - The Sun
consumables.pickup: May the light heal and enlighten you
effects: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass).

consumables.title: XX - Judgement
effects: Spawns a beggar.
Has a chance to be a demon beggar.
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.

consumables.title: XXI - The World
effects: Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one.
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass.

consumables.title: 2 of Spades
effects: Doubles the number of keys you have.
If you have no keys, it gives you two.

consumables.title: 2 of Clubs
effects: Doubles the number of Bombs you have.
If you have no bombs, it gives you two.

consumables.title: 2 of Hearts
effects: Doubles your current red hearts up to full health.
This card is useless for the Blu Baby.

consumables.title: 2 of Diamonds
effects: Doubles the number of coins you have.
If you have no coins, it gives you two.

consumables.title: The Joker
effects: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor.

consumables.title: Chaos Card
effects: A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits, including most bosses.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss with multiple forms such Satan, Mega Satan or Hush it will only kill that particular phase of the boss.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss that works from a single health bar such as Isaac, ??? or The Lamb, it will die instantly.
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path.
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door).
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #9 (Demo Man).

consumables.title: Credit Card
effects: When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free.
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #10 (Cursed!).

consumables.title: Rules Card
effects: Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:
"Rooms may yield more than you expect"
"Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you"
"The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence"
"Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound"
"A piece of paper is your guide"
"Deny his gifts to attain your reward"
"A dark market lies under your feet
"Chub dislikes smoke!
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #11 (Glass Cannon).

consumables.title: Card Against Humanity
effects: When used, fills the entire room with poop!
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #12 (When Life Gives You Lemons).

consumables.title: Suicide King
effects: When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor.
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items).
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #7 (Suicide King).

consumables.title: Rune of Algiz
effects: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 30 seconds (much longer than normal invincibility effects).
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #8 (Cat Got Your Tongue).

consumables.title: Rune of Ansuz
effects: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #5 (The Tank).

consumables.title: Rune of Berkano
effects: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #20 (Purist).

consumables.title: Rune of Dagaz
effects: Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor.
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill.
+1 Soul Heart.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #4 (Darkness Falls).

consumables.title: Rune of Ehwaz
effects: Creates a trapdoor on the floor (Same effect as We Need To Go Deeper).
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #3 (Head Trauma).

consumables.title: Rune of Hagalaz
effects: When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks, secret room entrances.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #1 (Pitch Black).

consumables.title: Rune of Jera
effects: When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room.
Creates copies of pickups, even if you haven't purchased them yet.
Can be used to double the number of golden item chests in the first room of the final Chest floor.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #2 (High Brow).

consumables.title: Rune of Perthro
effects: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6).
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #6 (Solar System).

consumables.title: Dice Rooms
effects: 1 Dot - Rerolls all of your items. (Does not change your trinkets, pills or cards)
2 Dot - Rerolls all pickups in the room. (D20 effect)
3 Dot - Rerolls all pickups on the entire floor.
4 Dot - Rerolls all pedestal items on the floor. (Does not roll your devil deal items)
5 Dot - Reroll and restart the current floor (Forget Me Now effect).
6 Dot - Reroll all of your items and all the pickups on the entire floor (Combined 1 + 3 + 4 rooms).

consumables.title: Blank Rune
effects: When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect.
Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro.
Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #30 (Guardian).

consumables.title: Dice Shard
effects: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time.

consumables.title: Get Out Of Jail Free Card
effects: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #22 (Speed).

consumables.title: ? Card
effects: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free.

consumables.title: Emergency Contact
effects: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy.

consumables.title: Gold Key
effects: Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor.

consumables.title: Gold Heart
effects: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #21 (XXXXXXXXL).

consumables.title: Bone Heart
effects: Takes three hits to deplete and can be refilled with red hearts, but disappears forever when depleted
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by unlocking the Forgotten character. See the Broken Shovel / Mom's Shovel items for more information on how to unlock.

consumables.title: Gold Bomb
effects: Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #23 (Blue Bomber).

consumables.title: Ace of Hearts
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Hearts.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating any floor after Basement I with only half a heart of health (works as The Lost).

consumables.title: Ace of Spades
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Keys.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb without taking hearts, coins and bombs.

consumables.title: Ace of Clubs
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Bombs.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by getting a 3 win streak.

consumables.title: Ace of Diamonds
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Coins.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in under 20 minutes.

consumables.title: Holy Card
effects: Grants the Holy Mantle effect for one room, which will negate your next hit of damage
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with The Lost.

consumables.title: Black Rune
effects: When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed.
Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders.
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode as Apollyon.

consumables.title: Huge Growth
effects: Temporarily makes Isaac huge, giving him +7 Damage Up and +30 Range Up for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by getting 5 items or consumables that increase your size, e.g. 'One Makes you Larger' pills, Magic Mushroom etc.

consumables.title: Ancient Recall
effects: Spawns 3 random cards on the floor when used
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

consumables.title: Era Walk
effects: When used, this card will slow down enemies, Isaac's tears by -1 Shot Speed, but speed up Isaac's movement speed by +0.50 for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
consumables.unlock: Unlock this item by getting both the Broken Watch and the Stop Watch in your collection

consumables.title: 48 Hour Energy (pill)
effects: Fully recharges your active item and drops 1-2 battery pickups. Can be used with Placebo to generate infinite batteries

consumables.title: Amnesia (pill)
effects: Hides the floor map for the rest of the current floor (same as curse of the lost). Can be negated with Black Candle

consumables.title: Bad Gas (pill)
effects: Isaac farts, poisoning enemies around him

consumables.title: Bad Trip (pill)
effects: Deals damage to yourself

consumables.title: Balls of Steel (pill)
effects: +2 Soul Hearts

consumables.title: Bombs are key (pill)
effects: Switches number of bombs and keys

consumables.title: Explosive Diarrhea (pill)
effects: Spawns five live troll bombs behind Isaac, one per second

consumables.title: Full Health (pill)
effects: Restores all your empty red heart containers

consumables.title: Health Down (pill)
effects: -1 HP. If you have 1 or less heart containers, this pill becomes Health Up

consumables.title: Health Up (pill)
effects: +1 HP

consumables.title: Hematemesis (pill)
effects: Empties all but one red heart container and spawns 1-4 red hearts on the floor

consumables.title: I can see forever (pill)
effects: Opens secret room and super secret room entrances on the current floor

consumables.title: I found pills (pill)
effects: Changes the appearance of Isaac's face for the current room (Cosmetic change only)

consumables.title: Lemon Party (pill)
effects: Spawns a large yellow pool on the floor around you, damaging enemies which walk in it

consumables.title: Luck Down (pill)
effects: Reduces your luck stat by -1

consumables.title: Luck Up (pill)
effects: Increases your luck stat by +1

consumables.title: Paralysis (pill)
effects: Prevents you from moving for a short while

consumables.title: Pheromones (pill)
effects: Applies the charm effect to all enemies in the room for a short while

consumables.title: Puberty (pill)
effects: Causes Isaac to grow hair for the rest of the run. Cosmetic change only. In Afterbirth+, taking 3 of this pill gives the Adult transformation

consumables.title: Pretty Fly (pill)
effects: Gives Isaac +1 fly orbital, which blocks enemy projectiles and damages fly-type enemies on touch

consumables.title: Range Down (pill)
effects: Reduces your range stat by -2

consumables.title: Range Up (pill)
effects: Increases your range stat by +2.5

consumables.title: R U a wizard? (pill)
effects: Tears will shoot diagonally for about 60 seconds. Effect persists between rooms while the time period is active

consumables.title: Speed Down (pill)
effects: Reduces your speed stat by -0.12

consumables.title: Speed Up (pill)
effects: Increases your speed stat by +0.15

consumables.title: Tears Down (pill)
effects: Reduces your tears stat by -0.28

consumables.title: Tears Up (pill)
effects: Increases your tears stat by 0.35

consumables.title: Telepills (pill)
effects: Teleports you to a random room when used. Has a small chance to take you to the I AM ERROR room, and a smaller chance to teleport to a Black Market

consumables.title: Addicted (pill)
effects: Causes you to take a full heart of damage for all sources for the current room. Unlocked from Challenge #24

consumables.title: Friends till the end (pill)
effects: Spawns three friendly blue attack flies

consumables.title: Infested! (pill)
effects: Destroys all poops in the room and spawns a blue attack spider on every destroyed poop

consumables.title: Infested? (pill)
effects: Spawns one blue attack spider for every enemy in the room. If there are no enemies this pill spawns 1-3 blue spiders instead

consumables.title: One makes you smaller (pill)
effects: Reduces Isaac's size and hitbox size

consumables.title: One makes you larger (pill)
effects: Increases Isaac's size, but does not affect the size of his hitbox

consumables.title: Percs (pill)
effects: Causes Isaac to only take half a heart of damage from all sources for the current room (The Wafer effect). Unlocked from Challenge #24

consumables.title: Power Pill (pill)
effects: Gives you invulnerability and the ability to damage enemies for a short while (similar to The Gamekid effect)

consumables.title: Re-Lax (pill)
effects: Causes Isaac to spawn poops behind him while he walks for a few seconds. Similar to Explosive Diarrhea but with poop

consumables.title: Retro Vision (pill)
effects: Pixelates the screen for a few seconds, obscuring your vision. Happens a total of 3 times over 30 seconds

consumables.title: ??? (pill)
effects: Gives the curse of the maze effect for the current floor. Unlocked from Challenge #25

consumables.title: Feels like I'm walking on sunshine! (pill)
effects: Turns Isaac invincible for a few seconds (similar to Unicorn Stump). Unlocked from the 'Sin Collector' achievement (collect every Bestiary entry)

consumables.title: Gulp! (pill)
effects: When used will consume your current trinket, destroying it and giving you its effect permanently. Unlocked from the 'Once more with the feeling!' achievement (complete a victory lap, defeating the lamb boss)

consumables.title: Horf! (pill)
effects: When used, shoots an Ipecac explosive shot. Unlocked from the 'Dedication' achievement (participate in 31 dailies in a row)

consumables.title: I'm Drowsy... (pill)
effects: Slows all enemies for the rest of the current room

consumables.title: I'm excited!!! (pill)
effects: Speeds up all enemies for the rest of the room. The effect triggers again 30 seconds after use and again 60 seconds after use

consumables.title: Something's wrong... (pill)
effects: Spawns a pool of black creep beneath Isaac

consumables.title: Vurp! (pill)
effects: Spawns the last pill you used. Spawns another Vurp! pill if no other pills were used yet. Unlocked from the 'U broke it!' achievement (collect 50 items in a single run)

consumables.title: X-Lax (pill)
effects: Spawns a pool of slippery brown creep beneath Isaac
